anya-e0805n:14_0: Tattha jinasāsanādhigamassa akkharakosallamūlakattā taṃ sampādetabbanti dassetuṃ abhidheyyappayojanavākyamidamuccate.
anya-e0805n:22_1: te ca kho jinavacanānurūpā akārādayo niggahītantā ekacattālīsamattā vaṇṇā paccekaṃ akkharā nāma honti.
anya-e0805n:22_3: ā i ī u ū e o,
anya-e0805n:22_9: ya ra lava sa ha ḷa aṃ-
anya-e0805n:28_0: Ṅa ña ṇa na mā sakaṭṭhānajā, nāsikaṭṭhānajā cāti.
anya-e0805n:33_0: Evaṃ ṭhānakaraṇappayatanasutikālabhinnesu akkharesu sarā nissayā, itare nissitā. Tattha –
anya-e0805n:34_0: Nissayādo sarā vuttā, byañjanā nissitā tato;
anya-e0805n:44_0: Tattha tesu akkharesu akārādīsu okārantā aṭṭha akkharā sarā nāma honti.
anya-e0805n:44_2: a ā i ī u ū e o- iti sarā.
anya-e0805n:45_0: O anto yesaṃ te odantā, dakāro sandhijo, saranti gacchantīti sarā, byañjane sārentītipi sarā.
anya-e0805n:48_0: Tattha aṭṭhasu saresu lahumattā tayo sarā rassā nāma honti. Taṃ yathā – a i u-iti rassā.
anya-e0805n:49_0: Lahukā mattā pamāṇaṃ yesaṃ te lahumattā,
anya-e0805n:52_0: Tattha aṭṭhasu saresu rassehi aññe dvimattā pañca sarā dīghā nāma honti.
anya-e0805n:53_3: Kvaci saṃyogapubbā ekārokārā rassā iva vuccante. Yathā – ettha, seyyo, oṭṭho, sotthi.
anya-e0805n:55_2: Saṃyogabhūte akkhare pare yo pubbo rassakkharo,
anya-e0805n:55_3: so garusañño hoti. Yathā – datvā, hitvā, bhutvā.
anya-e0805n:58_0: Dīgho ca saro garusañño hoti. Yathā – nāvā, nadī, vadhū, dve, tayo.
anya-e0805n:60_0: Ṭhapetvā aṭṭha sare sesā aḍḍhamattā akkharā kakārādayo niggahītantā tettiṃsa byañjanā nāma honti.
anya-e0805n:60_9: ya ra lava sa ha ḷa aṃ-
anya-e0805n:63_0: Tesaṃ kho byañjanānaṃ kakārādayo makārantā pañcavīsati byañjanā pañcapañcavibhāgena vaggā nāma honti.
anya-e0805n:64_2: tattha pañcapañcavibhāgenāti vā pañca pañca etesamatthīti vā pañcapañcaso,
anya-e0805n:66_2: aṃiti yaṃ akārato paraṃ vuttaṃ bindu,
anya-e0805n:69_0: Idha avuttānaṃ parasamaññānampi payojane sati gahaṇatthaṃ paribhāsamāha.
anya-e0805n:73_3: ya ra lava ha ḷā cāti ekavīsati ghosā nāma.
anya-e0805n:74_0: Ettha ca vaggānaṃ dutiyacatutthā dhanitātipi vuccanti,
anya-e0805n:78_11: asanto ettha na dissanti itīdha sarādisaññāyaṃ sabbasandhikaraṇaṭṭhāne byañjanaviyojanatthaṃ paribhāsamāha.
anya-e0805n:80_2: sandhitabbe sarasahitaṃ pubbabyañjanaṃ anatikkamanto adhoṭhitamassarañca katvā sarato viyojayeti sarato byañjanaṃ viyojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n:82_0: Sarā kho sabbepi sare pare ṭhite lopaṃ papponti.
anya-e0805n:82_3: Bahuvacanaṃ panettha ekekasmiṃ sare pare bahūnaṃ lopañāpanatthaṃ.
anya-e0805n:82_8: idaṃ pana suttaṃ upari paralopavidhānato pubbalopavidhānanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0805n:85_0: Sararahitaṃ kho byañjanaṃ adhoṭhitaṃ parakkharaṃ naye yutte ṭhāneti paranayanaṃ kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n:85_2: tena “akkocchi maṃ avadhi ma”ntiādīsu paranayanasandeho na hoti.
anya-e0805n:89_0: Asamānarūpamhā saramhā paro saro lopaṃ pappoti vā.
anya-e0805n:89_4: abhividhimhi ca vattamāno āupasaggo viya vāsaddo dvidhā vattate,
anya-e0805n:95_1: upa ikkhati, upa ito, ava icca,
anya-e0805n:95_4: yathā udake itīdha pubbāvaṇṇassarānaṃ lope kate “paro,
anya-e0805n:97_1: ukārabhūto ca paro saro asarūpe pubbassare lutte kvaci asavaṇṇaṃ pappoti.
anya-e0805n:99_0: Ettha ca satipi heṭṭhā vāggahaṇe kvacikaraṇato avaṇṇe eva lutte idha vuttavidhi hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n:100_6: gacchāmi iti, ati ito, kikī iva,
anya-e0805n:100_19: vi upasamo iccatra pubbassarānaṃ lope kate –
anya-e0805n:103_0: Saro kho paro pubbassare lutte kvaci dīghabhāvaṃ pappotīti ṭhānāsannavasena rassassarānaṃ savaṇṇadīgho.
anya-e0805n:106_7: sādhu iti itīdha parassarānaṃ lope kate –
anya-e0805n:109_0: Pubbo saro parassare lutte kvacidīghaṃ pappoti.
anya-e0805n:111_0: Kvacīti kiṃ? Yassadāni, itissa, idānipi, tesupi, cakkhundriyaṃ, kinnumāva.
anya-e0805n:114_0: Ekārassa padantabhūtassa ṭhāne sare pare kvaci yakārādeso hoti.
anya-e0805n:115_0: Adhigato kho myāyaṃ dhammo, putto tyāhaṃ, tyāssa pahīnā, pabbatyāhaṃ, yyāssa.
anya-e0805n:116_0: Kvacīti kiṃ? Te nāgatā, puttā matthi. Antaggahaṇaṃ kiṃ? Dhammacakkaṃ pavattento, damento cittaṃ.
anya-e0805n:117_3: ahaṃ kho ajja, yo ayaṃ, so assa, so eva,
anya-e0805n:117_6: su āgataṃ, su ākāro, du ākāro,
anya-e0805n:119_0: Okārukārānaṃ antabhūtānaṃ sare pare kvaci vakārādeso hoti. Ka kha ya tasaddādiokārassedaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0805n:124_0: Pubbo ivaṇṇo asarūpe sare pare yakāraṃ pappoti navā.
anya-e0805n:125_0: Paṭisanthāravutyassa, sabbā vityānubhuyyate, byañjanaṃ, byākato, nadyāsanno.
anya-e0805n:127_2: pati āharati, pati eti, iti assa, iti etaṃ,
anya-e0805n:127_3: itiādi itīdha “ivaṇṇo yaṃ navā”ti yakārādese sampatte –
anya-e0805n:130_0: Sabbo tiicceso saddo sare pare kvaci cakāraṃ pappoti.
anya-e0805n:130_2: itarathā kvaciggahaṇassa ca “atissa cantassā”tisuttassa ca niratthakatā siyā.
anya-e0805n:131_0: Accantaṃ, accodātā, paccayo, paccāharati, pacceti, iccassa, iccetaṃ, iccādi.
anya-e0805n:133_0: “Te na vāivaṇṇe”ti ito “na ivaṇṇe”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n:135_0: Atiiccetassa antabhūtassa tisaddassa ivaṇṇe pare “sabbo caṃ tī”ti vuttarūpaṃ na hoti.
anya-e0805n:135_3: Ettha ca antasaddo saddavidhinisedhappakaraṇato atisaddantabhūtaṃ tisaddameva vadati,
anya-e0805n:137_0: Ivaṇṇassa sarūpasmiṃ, yādeso ca na sambhave.
anya-e0805n:138_3: evaṃ atīto, atīritaṃ, itīti, itīdaṃ, patīto.
anya-e0805n:139_0: Abhi akkhānaṃ, abhi uggato, abhi okāso itīdha yakāre sampatte –
anya-e0805n:142_0: Abhiiccetassa sabbassa sare pare abbhādeso hoti.
anya-e0805n:146_0: Adhi agamā, adhi upagato, adhi ogāhetvā itīdha
anya-e0805n:148_0: Adhiiccetassa sabbassa sare pare ajjhādeso hoti. Ajjhagamā, ajjhupagato, ajjhogāhetvā.
anya-e0805n:152_0: Te ca kho abhiadhiiccete upasaggā ivaṇṇe pare abbho ajjhoiti vuttarūpā na honti vā.
anya-e0805n:155_0: Dhaiccetassa sare pare kvaci dakāro hoti.
anya-e0805n:156_0: Casaddena kvaci sādhussa dhassa hakāro, yathā – sāhu dassanaṃ.
anya-e0805n:160_1: Dīghasaramhā parassa evasaddādibhūtassa ekārassa rikāro hoti,
anya-e0805n:160_2: pubbo ca saro rasso hoti navā.
anya-e0805n:164_0: Ivaṇṇauvaṇṇaiccete yathākkamaṃ jhalasaññā honti. Vaṇṇaggahaṇaṃ savaṇṇaggahaṇatthaṃ.
anya-e0805n:166_0: Ākhyāte liṅgamajjhe ca, dviliṅgante ca dassanā.
anya-e0805n:168_0: Jhalaiccetesaṃ iyauvaiccete ādesā honti vā sare pare, saralopo.
anya-e0805n:173_0: Goiccetassa okārassa sare pare avādeso hoti samāse.
anya-e0805n:173_3: Casaddaggahaṇena uvaṇṇassa uvaavādesā. Yathā – bhuvi, pasavo.
anya-e0805n:176_0: Puthaiccetassa nipātassa ante kvaci gakārāgamo hoti sare pare.
anya-e0805n:176_3: Ettha ca “sare”ti nimittāsannavasena puthassa anteti labbhati.
anya-e0805n:180_0: Pāiccetassa ante sare pare kvaci gakārāgamo hoti,
anya-e0805n:180_1: pāssa anto ca saro rasso hoti.
anya-e0805n:182_0: 34. Yava ma da na ta ra lā cāgamā.
anya-e0805n:183_0: Sare pare yakārādayo aṭṭha āgamā honti vā.
anya-e0805n:184_6: evaṃ māyidaṃ, māyevaṃ, taṃyidaṃ, taṃyeva, nayidaṃ,
anya-e0805n:188_0: Dakāro uupasagga saki kenaci kiñci kismiñci koci sammā yāva tāva puna ya te’tattasādīhi.
anya-e0805n:188_3: evaṃ udayo, udapādi, udāhaṭaṃ, udito, udīritaṃ, udeti.
anya-e0805n:191_0: Ādisaddena aññadatthaṃ, manasādaññā vimuttānaṃ, bahudeva rattiṃ, ahudeva bhayaṃ.
anya-e0805n:192_0: Vāti kiṃ? Kenaci atthakāmena, sammā aññāya, yāvāhaṃ, tāvāhaṃ, punāparaṃ, attatthaṃ.
anya-e0805n:193_0: Nakāro āyatādimhi. Ito āyati ito nāyati, ciraṃ nāyati.
anya-e0805n:194_0: Takāro yasmā tasmā ajjādito ihaggādimhi. Yasmātiha, tasmātiha, ajjatagge.
anya-e0805n:195_0: Rakāro ni dupātu puna dhī pāta caturādito.
anya-e0805n:207_0: Itthiyaṃ vattamānā akārantato liṅgamhā paro āppaccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n:210_1: paranayane ca kate “dhātuppaccayavibhattivajjitamatthavaṃ liṅga”nti vuttattāva paccayantassāpi aliṅgattā
anya-e0805n:210_2: vibhattuppattiyamasampattāyaṃ “taddhitasamāsakitakā nāmaṃ vā’tavetunādīsu cā”ti ettha vaggahaṇena itthippaccayantassāpi
anya-e0805n:211_0: Bahuvacane “ālapane si gasañño”ti ito “sañño”, “te itthikhyā po”ti ito “itthikhyā”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n:213_1: tadā ghasañño hotīti ghasaññāyaṃ “ghapato ca yonaṃ lopo”ti vikappena yolopo.
anya-e0805n:216_0: Ghato parassa gassa ekāro hoti, saralopādi. Bhoti kaññe, bhotiyo kaññā kaññāyo.
anya-e0805n:218_0: Tatiyādīsu “āya catutthekavacanassa tū”ti ito “āyo, ekavacanāna”nti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n:220_0: Ghasaññato liṅgassākārā paresaṃ nādīnaṃ smiṃpariyantānaṃ ekavacanānaṃ vibhattigaṇānaṃ āyādeso hoti.
anya-e0805n:223_0: Ghapato parassa smiṃvacanassa yaṃ hoti vā, aññatthāyādeso. Kaññāyaṃ kaññāya, kaññāsu.
anya-e0805n:225_0: Saddhā medhā paññā vijjā, cintā mantā vīṇā taṇhā;
anya-e0805n:226_0: Icchā mucchā ejā māyā, mettā mattā sikkhā bhikkhā.
anya-e0805n:231_0: Pipāsā vedanā saññā, cetanā tasiṇā pajā;
anya-e0805n:232_0: Devatā vaṭṭakā godhā, balākā parisā sabhā.
anya-e0805n:234_0: Visākhā visikhā sākhā, vacā vañjhā jaṭā ghaṭā.
anya-e0805n:235_0: Jeṭṭhā soṇḍā vitaṇḍā ca, karuṇā vanitā latā;
anya-e0805n:236_0: Kathā niddā sudhā rādhā, vāsanā siṃsapā papā.
anya-e0805n:242_0: Nāsā juṇhā guhā īhā, lasikā vasudhādayo.
anya-e0805n:243_0: Ammādīnaṃ ālapaneva rūpabhedo. Ammā, ammā ammāyo.
anya-e0805n:246_0: Ammā annāiccevamādito parassa gassa ālapanekavacanassa na ekārattaṃ hoti. “Ākāro vā”ti rassattaṃ.
anya-e0805n:253_2: tadā pasaññā hontīti pasaññāyaṃ “ghapato cā”tiādinā yolopo,
anya-e0805n:253_4: Rattī rattiyo ratyo vā, he ratti,
anya-e0805n:257_0: Pasaññato ivaṇṇuvaṇṇehi paresaṃ nādīnamekavacanānaṃ vibhattigaṇānaṃ yāādeso hoti. Rattiyā,
anya-e0805n:260_0: Paiccetasmā paresaṃ smiṃ smāiccetesaṃ yathākkamaṃ aṃ āādesā honti vā.
anya-e0805n:263_0: Pasaññassa ivaṇṇassa yovacanekavacanavibhattīnamādese sare pare yakāro hoti.
anya-e0805n:263_1: Ettha ca yakārassevādhikārato pasaññaggahaṇena ivaṇṇova gayhati,
anya-e0805n:266_0: Ādiiccetasmā smiṃvacanassa aṃ oādesā honti vā.
anya-e0805n:268_0: Patti yutti vutti kitti, mutti titti khanti kanti;
anya-e0805n:269_0: Santi tanti siddhi suddhi, iddhi vuddhi buddhi bodhi.
anya-e0805n:270_0: Bhūmi jāti pīti sūti, nandi sandhi sāṇi koṭi;
anya-e0805n:271_0: Diṭṭhi vuḍḍhi tuṭṭhi yaṭṭhi, pāḷi āḷi nāḷi keḷi;
anya-e0805n:272_0: Sati mati gati cuti, dhiti yuvati vikati.
anya-e0805n:273_0: Rati ruci rasmi asani vasani osadhi aṅguli dhūli dundubhi doṇi aṭavi chavi ādīni ikārantanāmāni.
anya-e0805n:278_0: Nadādito vā anadādito vā itthiyaṃ vattamānā liṅgamhā īppaccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n:279_0: Saralope “kvacāsavaṇṇaṃ lutte”ti asavaṇṇe sampatte pakatibhāvo nāmabyapadeso,
anya-e0805n:280_0: Dutiyekavacane “ghapato smiṃ yaṃ vā”ti ito “vā”ti vattate.
anya-e0805n:282_0: Pasaññato īkārato parassa aṃvacanassa yaṃ hoti vā.
anya-e0805n:283_1: Yolopābhāve “tato yonamo tū”ti ettha tusaddena yonamokāro ca,
anya-e0805n:284_0: Ettha cevaṃ sijjhantānaṃ najjoādīnaṃ vuttiyaṃ ānattaggahaṇādinā nipphādanaṃ atraja sugatādīnaṃ viya nipphādanūpāyantaradassanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n:285_0: He nadi, he nadī he najjo he nadiyo, nadiyaṃ nadiṃ, nadī najjo nadiyo.
anya-e0805n:286_0: Amādisutte ā patoti yogavibhāgena kvaci nāsānañcāttaṃ,
anya-e0805n:289_0: Mahī vetaraṇī vāpī, pāṭalī kadalī ghaṭī;
anya-e0805n:290_0: Nārī kumārī taruṇī, vāruṇī brāhmaṇī sakhī.
anya-e0805n:291_0: Gandhabbī kinnarī nāgī, devī yakkhī ajī migī;
anya-e0805n:292_0: Vānarī sūkarī sīhī, haṃsī kākī ca kukkuṭī –
anya-e0805n:296_0: Mātula ayyakavaruṇaiccevamādīnamanto ānattamāpajjate īkāre paccaye pare,
anya-e0805n:297_1: “O sare cā”ti ettha casaddena ukārassa avādeso. Puthavī,
anya-e0805n:298_1: Mahāvuttinā vā “gāva se”ti ettha gāvaiti yogavibhāgena vā okārassa āvādeso. Gāvī,
anya-e0805n:301_0: Ṇava ṇika ṇeyya ṇantuppaccayantehi itthiyaṃ vattamānehi liṅgehi īppaccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n:304_0: Sabbasseva ntuppaccayassa takāro hoti vā īkārappaccaye pare,
anya-e0805n:305_0: Evaṃ kulavatī, sīlavatī, yasavatī, rūpavatī, satimatī, gottamatī.
anya-e0805n:306_0: Mahantasaddato “nadādito vā ī”ti īppaccayo, ntubyapadeso vikappena takārādeso. Mahatī mahantī.
anya-e0805n:309_0: Sabbasseva bhavantasaddassa bhotādeso hoti īkāre itthigate pare. Sā bhotī,
anya-e0805n:312_0: Pati bhikkhu rāja iccetehi īkārantehi ca itthiyaṃ vattamānehi liṅgehi inīppaccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n:313_0: “Saralopo’mādesa”iccādisutte tuggahaṇena kvaci pubbalopassa nisedhanato “vā paro asarūpā”ti saralopo.
anya-e0805n:318_3: “Tato yonamo tū”ti sutte tuggahaṇena yonamokāro ca,
anya-e0805n:324_0: Evaṃ dhātu dhenu kāsu daddu kacchu kaṇḍu rajju kareṇu piyaṅgu sassuādīni.
anya-e0805n:326_7: Mātarehi mātarebhi mātūhi mātūbhi mātuhi mātubhi,
anya-e0805n:327_0: Evaṃ dhītā, dhītaro, duhitā, duhitaro iccādi.
anya-e0805n:330_0: Jambū, jambū jambuyo, he jambu, he jambū jambuyo, jambuṃ, jambū jambuyo iccādi itthīsaddasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n:331_0: Evaṃ vadhū ca sarabhū, sarabū sutanū camū;
anya-e0805n:336_0: Kaññā ratti nadī itthī, mātulānī ca bhikkhunī;
anya-e0805n:337_0: Daṇḍinī yāgu mātā ca, jambū gotitthisaṅgaho.
anya-e0805n:345_2: Akārantehi napuṃsakaliṅgehi parassa sivacanassa aṃ hoti niccaṃ.
anya-e0805n:348_0: Akārantehi napuṃsakaliṅgehi yonaṃ niccaṃ ni hoti.
anya-e0805n:367_0: Kammaṃ, kammā kammāni, he kamma, he kammā kammāni, kammaṃ, kamme kammāni.
anya-e0805n:370_0: Kammasaddantassa ukāra akārādesā honti vā nāmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n:370_2: Casaddaggahaṇena yuva maghavānamantassa ā hoti kvaci nā suiccetesu.
anya-e0805n:371_0: Sasmāsu “u nāmhi cā”ti ettha casaddena puma kammathāmantassa cukāro vā sasmāsūti uttaṃ.
anya-e0805n:372_0: Smiṃvacane “brahmato tu smiṃnī”ti ettha tusaddena kvaci ni hoti.
anya-e0805n:374_0: Guṇavantu si, “savibhattissa, ntussa, simhī”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n:376_0: Napuṃsake vattamānassa liṅgassa sambandhino ntuppaccayassa savibhattissa aṃ hoti simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n:377_0: Yomhi “ntussanto yosu cā”ti attaṃ, ikāro ca. Guṇavanti, guṇavantāni, sesaṃ ñeyyaṃ.
anya-e0805n:378_0: Gacchanta si, “simhi gacchantādīnaṃ ntasaddo a”miti aṃ. Gacchaṃ gacchantaṃ, gacchantā gacchantāni.
anya-e0805n:383_0: Assaddhaṃ kulaṃ, assaddhā assaddhāni kulāni iccādi.
anya-e0805n:390_0: Napuṃsakaliṅgehi paresaṃ sabbesaṃ yonaṃ ni hoti vā.
anya-e0805n:391_1: aññattha niccaṃ yolopo, dīgho ca, aṭṭhī,
anya-e0805n:392_0: Evaṃ satthi dadhi vāri akkhi acchi acci iccādīni.
anya-e0805n:395_0: “Sukhabhārī si” itīdha anapuṃsakattābhāvā sismimpi “agho rassa”miccādinā rassattaṃ, silopo.
anya-e0805n:398_0: Ukāranto napuṃsakaliṅgo āyusaddo. Tassa aṭṭhisaddasseva rūpanayo.
anya-e0805n:400_0: Evaṃ cakkhu vasu dhanu dāru tipu madhu hiṅgu siggu vatthu matthu jatu ambu assuādīni.
anya-e0805n:407_0: “Cittā gāvo assa kulassā”ti atthe bahubbīhisamāse kate “saro rasso napuṃsake”ti okārassa ṭhānappayatanāsannattā rassattamukāro,
anya-e0805n:414_0: Sabba, katara, katama, ubhaya, itara, añña, aññatara, aññatama, pubba, para, apara, dakkhiṇa, uttara, adhara, ya, ta, eta, ima, amu, kiṃ, eka, ubha, dvi, ti, catu, tumha,
anya-e0805n:416_0: Bahuvacane “sabba yo” itīdha “parasamaññā payoge”ti sabbādīnaṃ sabbanāmasaññā.
anya-e0805n:419_1: tesaṃ sabbesaṃ sabbanāmasaññānaṃ liṅgānaṃ akārato paro paṭhamo yo ettamāpajjate.
anya-e0805n:421_0: He sabba sabbā, he sabbe, sabbaṃ, sabbe, sabbena, sabbehi sabbebhi.
anya-e0805n:423_0: “Ato, ā e, smāsmiṃnaṃ, āya catutthekavacanassā”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n:425_0: Akārantehi sabbanāmehi paresaṃ smā smiṃ iccetesaṃ,
anya-e0805n:425_1: catutthekavacanassa ca ā e āyaiccete ādesā neva hontīti āyādesābhāvo.
anya-e0805n:425_3: tena pubbādīhi smā smiṃnaṃ ā e ca honti. Sabbassa.
anya-e0805n:428_0: Sabbesaṃ sabbanāmānaṃ akāro ettamāpajjate naṃmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n:431_0: Sabbato sabbanāmato parassa naṃvacanassa saṃ sānaṃiccete ādesā honti.
anya-e0805n:433_1: Aññaṃ kaññāsaddasamaṃ aññatra sa naṃ smiṃvacanehi.
anya-e0805n:434_0: Catutthekavacane “sabbanāmato vā”, sabbato koti ito “sabbato”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n:436_0: Sabbato sabbanāmato ghapasaññato smiṃ saiccetesaṃ yathākkamaṃ saṃsāādesā honti vā.
anya-e0805n:439_0: Ghasañño ākāro rassamāpajjate saṃsāsvekavacanesu vibhattādesesu paresu.
anya-e0805n:442_0: Saṃ sāiccetesu ekavacanaṭṭhānasambhūtesu vibhattādesesu paresu liṅgamhā sakārāgamo hoti.
anya-e0805n:446_0: Etehi sabbanāmehi ghapasaññehi parassa smiṃvacanassa neva āya yādesā hontīti āyābhāvo.
anya-e0805n:446_1: Vādhikārato kvaci hoti dakkhiṇāya uttarāyāti ādi.
anya-e0805n:448_0: Napuṃsake sabbaṃ cittaṃ, sabbāni, he sabba, he sabbāni, sabbaṃ, sabbāni. Sesaṃ pulliṅge viya ñeyyaṃ.
anya-e0805n:449_0: Evaṃ katarādīnaṃ aññatamasaddapariyantānaṃ tīsupi liṅgesu rūpanayo.
anya-e0805n:457_0: Dvandasamāsaṭṭhā sabbanāmakārato paro paṭhamo yo ettamāpajjate vā.
anya-e0805n:459_1: Bahuvacane “dhātuliṅgehi parā paccayā”ti ettha parāti niddesato pubbādīhi yovacanassa vikappenekāro.
anya-e0805n:460_1: he pubbe he pubbā, pubbaṃ, pubbe, pubbena,
anya-e0805n:461_0: Itthiyaṃ pubbā disā, pubbā pubbāyo iccādi sabbāsaddasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n:462_0: Napuṃsake pubbaṃ ṭhānaṃ, pubbāni, he pubba,
anya-e0805n:465_0: Dvandaṭṭhā sabbanāmato parassa yovacanassa ṭhapetvā ettaṃ aññaṃ sabbanāmikaṃ kāriyaṃ na hotīti saṃsānamādesābhāvo.
anya-e0805n:468_0: Bahubbīhimhi ca samāse sabbanāmikavidhānaṃ nāññaṃ hoti. Piyapubbāya, piyapubbānaṃ, piyapubbe.
anya-e0805n:470_0: Dakkhiṇassā ca pubbassā ca yadantarāḷanti atthe bahubbīhi,
anya-e0805n:471_0: Yatetasaddādīnamālapane rūpaṃ na sambhavati. Yasaddo aniyamattho.
anya-e0805n:472_1: ye purisā, yaṃ, ye. Yā kaññā, yā yāyo, yaṃ, yā yāyo.
anya-e0805n:473_0: Ta eta ima amu kiṃiccete parammukha samīpa accantasamīpadūra pucchanatthavacanā.
anya-e0805n:477_0: Eta taiccetesaṃ anapuṃsakānaṃ takāro sakāramāpajjate simhi vibhattimhi. So puriso.
anya-e0805n:480_0: Taiccetassa sabbanāmassa takārassa nattaṃ hoti vā sabbattha liṅgesu. Ne te, naṃ taṃ, ne te,
anya-e0805n:483_0: Taiccetassa sabbanāmassa sabbasseva attaṃ hoti vā sa smā smiṃ saṃ sāiccetesu vacanesu sabbattha liṅgesu.
anya-e0805n:484_0: “Smāhismiṃnaṃ mhābhimhi vā”ti ito “smāsmiṃnaṃ, mhāmhī”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n:486_0: Ta imaiccetehi katākārehi paresaṃ smāsmiṃnaṃ mhā mhiiccete ādesā na honti.
anya-e0805n:488_0: Atha sarānameva sandhikāriye sampatte pakatibhāvo vuccate.
anya-e0805n:491_0: Sarā kho sare pare kvaci chandabhedāsukhuccāraṇaṭṭhāne,
anya-e0805n:492_0: Tattha pakatiṭṭhānaṃ nāma ālapanantā anitismiṃ acchandānurakkhaṇe asamāse padantadīghā ca ikārukārā ca nāmapadantātītakriyādimhīti evamādi.
anya-e0805n:494_0: Kvaciggahaṇena itismiṃ chandānurakkhaṇe sandhi hoti, yathā – sakkā devīti, namo te buddha vīratthu.
anya-e0805n:495_0: Sareti kiṃ? Sādhu mahārājāti, evaṃ kira bhikkhūti.
anya-e0805n:500_0: Nāmapadantaikārukāresu – gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi, pupphāni āhariṃsu, satthu adāsi.
anya-e0805n:503_0: Sarā kho byañjane pare pakatirūpā hontīti yebhuyyena dīgharassalopehi vikārābhāvo. Yathā – accayo, paccayo,
anya-e0805n:509_0: Sarā kho byañjane pare kvaci dīghaṃ pappontīti suttasukhuccāraṇachandānurakkhaṇaṭṭhānesu dīgho.
anya-e0805n:510_2: madhuva maññati bālo madhuvā maññatī bālo,
anya-e0805n:515_0: Sarā kho byañjane pare kvaci rassaṃ pappontīti chandānurakkhaṇe, āgame, saṃyoge ca rassattaṃ.
anya-e0805n:518_0: Saṃyoge parākamo parakkamo, āsādo assādo, evaṃ taṇhakkhayo, jhānassa lābhimhi, vasimhi, thullaccayo.
anya-e0805n:519_0: Kvacīti kiṃ? Māyidaṃ, manasā daññā vimuttānaṃ, yathākkamaṃ, ākhyātikaṃ, dīyyati, sūyyati.
anya-e0805n:520_0: Eso kho byantiṃ kāhiti, so gacchaṃ na nivattati iccatra –
anya-e0805n:523_0: Sarā kho byañjane pare kvaci lopaṃ papponti,
anya-e0805n:523_1: tatra lutte ṭhāne akārāgamo ca hoti.
anya-e0805n:524_0: Esa kho byantiṃ kāhiti, sa gacchaṃ na nivattati, evaṃ esa dhammo, esa pattosi, sa muni, sa sīlavā.
anya-e0805n:525_0: Kvacīti kiṃ? Eso dhammo, so muni, so sīlavā.
anya-e0805n:526_0: Casaddena etasaddantassa sarepi kvaci lopo. Yathā – esa attho, esa ābhogo, esa idāni.
anya-e0805n:529_0: Saramhā parassa byañjanassa dvebhāvo hoti ṭhāne. Dvinnaṃ bhāvo dvibhāvo, so eva dvebhāvo.
anya-e0805n:530_0: Ettha ca ṭhānaṃ nāma rassākārato paraṃ pa pati paṭikamukusa kudha kī gaha juta ñāsi su sambhū sara sasādīnamādibyañjanānaṃ dvebhāvaṃ,
anya-e0805n:535_0: Kamādidhātūsu – pakkamo, paṭikkamo, hetukkamo, ākamati akkamati, evaṃ parakkamati, yathākkamaṃ.
anya-e0805n:539_0: Paggaho, viggaho, anuggaho, niggaho, candaggaho, diṭṭhiggāho.
anya-e0805n:541_0: Kataññū, viññū, paññāṇaṃ, viññāṇaṃ, anuññā, manuññā, samaññā.
anya-e0805n:548_0: Saramhāti kiṃ? Sampayutto, sampatijāto, sampaṭicchannaṃ, saṅkamanto, saṅgaho.
anya-e0805n:551_0: Vatu vaṭu disādīnamante yathā – vattati, vaṭṭati, dassanaṃ, phasso iccādi.
anya-e0805n:552_0: U du ni upasaggādiparesu – ukaṃso ukkaṃso. Dukaraṃ dukkaraṃ, nikaṅkho nikkaṅkhe.
anya-e0805n:553_1: duccaritaṃ, nijjaṭaṃ, uññātaṃ, unnati, uttaro, dukkaro, niddaro, unnato, duppañño, dubbalo, nimmalo, uyyutto, dullabho, nibbatto, ussāho, dussaho, nissāro.
anya-e0805n:554_0: Tathā takkaro, tajjo, tanninno, tappabhavo, tammayo.
anya-e0805n:558_0: Ṭhāneti kiṃ? Nikāyo, nidānaṃ, nivāso, nivāto, tato, catuvīsati, chasaṭṭhi.
anya-e0805n:559_1: abhibhūyya, viceyya, vineyya, dheyyaṃ, neyyaṃ, seyyo, jeyyo,
anya-e0805n:564_0: “Sabbassa so dāmhi vā”ti ito maṇḍūkagatiyā vāti vattate.
anya-e0805n:566_0: Yakāravantānaṃ talanadakārānaṃ saṃyogabyañjanāni yathākkamaṃ calañajakārattamāpajjante vā.
anya-e0805n:567_0: Kāraggahaṇaṃ yavataṃ sakāra ka ca ṭa pavaggānaṃ sakārakacaṭapavaggādesatthaṃ,
anya-e0805n:567_1: tathā yavataṃ ta dha ṇakārānaṃ cha jhañakārādesatthañca,
anya-e0805n:568_0: Jaccandho, vipallāso, aññāyo, yajjevaṃ, appekacce appekadā.
anya-e0805n:572_0: Chandānurakkhaṇe – nappajjahe vaṇṇabalaṃ purāṇaṃ, ujjugatesu seyyo, gacchanti suggatinti.
anya-e0805n:573_0: Vaggacatutthadutiyesu pana tasmiṃyevādhikāre “paradvebhāvo ṭhāne”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n:576_0: Saramhā parabhūtānaṃ vagge ghosāghosānaṃ byañjanānaṃ yathākkamaṃ vaggatatiya paṭhamakkharā dvibhāvaṃ
anya-e0805n:576_1: gacchanti ṭhāneti ṭhānāsannavasena tabbagge tatiyapaṭhamāva honti.
anya-e0805n:577_0: Ettha ca sampatte niyamattā ghosāghosaggahaṇena catutthadutiyāva adhippetā,
anya-e0805n:577_3: tammayo”tiādīsu vaggapañcamānaṃ satipi ghosatte tatiyappasaṅgona hoti,
anya-e0805n:578_0: Gharādīsu pa u du niādiparacatutthesu tāva –
anya-e0805n:579_0: Yavata mādesādīsu – bojjhaṅgā, āsabbhaṃ, bujjhitabbaṃ, bujjhati.
anya-e0805n:580_0: Ṭhāneti kiṃ? Sīlavantassa jhāyino, ye jhānappasutā dhīrā, nidhānaṃ, mahādhanaṃ.
anya-e0805n:583_0: Saramhāti kiṃ? Saṅkhāro, taṅkhaṇe, sañchannaṃ, taṇṭhānaṃ, santhuto, tamphalaṃ.
anya-e0805n:584_0: Ṭhāneti kiṃ? Pūvakhajjakaṃ, tassa chaviyādīni chinditvā, yathā ṭhitaṃ, kathaṃ, kammaphalaṃ.
anya-e0805n:585_2: “do dhassa cā”ti ettha caggahaṇassa bahulatthattā tena caggahaṇena yathāpayogaṃ bahudhā ādeso siyā.
anya-e0805n:586_1: ni upasaggato kamu pada ci cara tarānaṃ paṭhamassa vaggadutiyo iminā dvittaṃ,
anya-e0805n:587_0: Tathā bo vassa kuva diva siva vajādīnaṃ dvirūpassāti vakāradvayassa bakāradvayaṃ, yathā – kubbanto,
anya-e0805n:590_0: Ko tassa niyatādīnaṃ kvaci. Niyato niyako.
anya-e0805n:591_0: Yo jassa nijādissa vā, nijaṃputtaṃ niyaṃputtaṃ.
anya-e0805n:593_2: evaṃ paṇipāto, paṇāmo, paṇītaṃ, pariṇato, pariṇāmo,
anya-e0805n:596_0: Patiiccetassa upasaggassa sare vā byañjane vā pare kvaci paṭiādeso hoti pubbassaralopo. Paṭaggi,
anya-e0805n:600_0: Puthaiccetassa anto saro ukāro hoti byañjane pare, dvittaṃ. Puthujjano, puthubhūtaṃ.
anya-e0805n:601_2: “Puthassa a putha”iti samāseneva siddhe puna antaggahaṇādhikārena kvaci aputhantassāpi uttaṃ sare.
anya-e0805n:602_0: Mano aññaṃ manuññaṃ, evaṃ imaṃ evumaṃ, paralopo, iti evaṃ itvevaṃ, ukārassa vakāro.
anya-e0805n:606_0: Avaiccetassa upasaggassa okāro hoti kvaci byañjane pare. Okāso, onaddho, ovadati, osānaṃ.
anya-e0805n:612_0: Avasaddassa upapade tiṭṭhamānassa tassokārassa viparīto ca hoti byañjane pare.
anya-e0805n:617_0: Byañjane pare kvaci okārāgamo hotīti atippa parasaddehi okārāgamo “yavamada”iccādisutte casaddena atippato gakārāgamo ca.
anya-e0805n:618_0: Atippago kho tāva, parosataṃ, parosahassaṃ, ettha “sarā sare lopa”nti pubbassaralopo.
anya-e0805n:630_0: Vaggabhūte byañjane pare niggahītaṃ kho vaggantaṃ vā pappotīti nimittānusvarānaṃ ṭhānāsannavasena tabbaggapañcamo hoti.
anya-e0805n:632_0: Idha na bhavati, na taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ sādhu, saraṇaṃ gacchāmi.
anya-e0805n:633_0: Sati copari vāggahaṇe vijjhantare vā idha vāggahaṇakaraṇamatthantaraviññāpanatthaṃ,
anya-e0805n:633_1: tena niggahītassa saṃupasaggapumantassa le lakāro. Yathā –
anya-e0805n:634_0: Paccattaṃ eva, taṃ eva, tañhi tassa, evañhi vo itīdha “vā”ti adhikāro.
anya-e0805n:636_0: Ekārahakāre pare niggahītaṃ kho ñakāraṃ pappoti vā, ekāre ñādesassa dvibhāvo.
anya-e0805n:637_0: Paccattaññevapaccattaṃ eva, taññeva taṃ eva, tañhi tassa tañhi tassa, evañhi vo evañhi vo.
anya-e0805n:638_0: Vavatthitavibhāsattā vāsaddassa evahinipātato aññattha na hoti, yathā – evametaṃ, evaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n:639_0: Saṃyogo, saṃyojanaṃ, saṃyato, saṃyācikāya, yaṃ yadeva, ānantarikaṃ yamāhu itīdha “ña”miti vattate.
anya-e0805n:641_0: Niggahītaṃ kho yakāre pare saha yakārena ñakāraṃ pappoti vā, ñādesassa dvittaṃ.
anya-e0805n:643_0: Vāsaddassa vavatthitavibhāsattāva saṃpadantato ca sabbanāmayakāraparato ca niggahītā aññattha na hoti. Yathā –
anya-e0805n:644_0: Ettha ca “saha ye cā”ti vattabbe “sa ye cā”ti vacanato suttantesu sukhuccāraṇatthamakkharalopopīti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0805n:644_2: sayaṃ abhiññāya sacchikatvā sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā,
anya-e0805n:647_0: Niggahītassa kho sare pare makāradakārādesā honti vā.
anya-e0805n:647_1: Ettha ca vāsaddādhikārassa vavatthitavibhāsattā dakāro yatetasaddato parasseva.
anya-e0805n:649_0: Vāti kiṃ? Taṃ ahaṃ, etaṃ eva, akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ.
anya-e0805n:650_0: Ettha ca madāti yogavibhāgena byañjanepi vā makāro. Tena “buddhama saraṇama gacchāmī”tiādi sijjhati.
anya-e0805n:651_0: Tāsaṃ ahaṃ santike, vidūnaṃ aggaṃ, tassa adāsiṃ ahaṃ itīdha “sare”ti vattate.
anya-e0805n:653_0: Niggahītaṃ kho sare pare lopaṃ pappoti kvaci chandānurakkhaṇe sukhuccāraṇaṭṭhāne.
anya-e0805n:654_0: Tāsāhaṃ santike, vidūnaggaṃ, tassa adāsāhaṃ, tathāgatāhaṃ, evāhaṃ, kyāhaṃ.
anya-e0805n:658_0: Niggahītaṃ kho byañjane ca pare lopaṃ pappoti kvaci chandānurakkhaṇādimhi.
anya-e0805n:659_1: etaṃ buddhāna sāsanaṃ, sāratto, sārāgo, sārambho,
anya-e0805n:661_5: kiṃ idāni, tvaṃ asi, idaṃ api,
anya-e0805n:663_0: Niggahītamhā paro saro lopaṃ pappoti vā. Niggahītassa vaggantattaṃ.
anya-e0805n:665_0: Vāti kiṃ? Kataṃ iti, kimiti, dātumapi, sāmaṃ eva.
anya-e0805n:666_0: Ayampi vāsaddassa vavatthitavibhāsattā itīvīdānisīpevādito aññattha na hoti. Yathā –
anya-e0805n:667_1: pupphaṃ assā uppajjati itīdha sare pare lutte vipariṇāmena “parasmiṃ, sare,
anya-e0805n:669_0: Niggahītamhā parasmiṃ sare lutte byañjano saññogo ce,
anya-e0805n:671_0: Evaṃ sa te āsavā, pupphaṃsā uppajjati.
anya-e0805n:673_0: Casaddena tiṇṇaṃ byañjanānaṃ sarūpasaṃyogopi visaññogo hoti. Yathā – agyāgāraṃ, vutyassa.
anya-e0805n:676_0: Niggahītañca āgamo hoti sare vā byañjane vā kvaci sukhuccāraṇaṭṭhāne.
anya-e0805n:678_0: Kvacīti kiṃ? Na hi etehi, idha ceva.
anya-e0805n:679_3: aggiṃva sanamaṃ itīdha lopādesakāriye sampatte yebhuyyena tadapavādatthamāha.
anya-e0805n:681_0: Niggahītaṃ kho byañjane pare aṃiti hoti.
anya-e0805n:683_0: Evaṃ vutte, taṃ sādhu, ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā, aggiṃva sandhamaṃ.
anya-e0805n:686_0: Ye idha amhehi visesato na upadiṭṭhā upasagganipātādayo,
anya-e0805n:686_1: tesaṃ vuttayogato vuttanayena sarasandhādīsu vuttanayānusārena rūpasiddhi veditabbā.
anya-e0805n:687_0: Tena “do dhassa cā”ti sutte casaddena pariyādīnaṃ rahanādivaṇṇassa vipariyayo yavādīhi, yathā –
anya-e0805n:688_0: “Taṃ imināpi jānāthā”ti ettha “paro vā saro”ti sare lutte “tatrākāro”ti yogavibhāgena akāro niggahītassa dakāro,
anya-e0805n:698_0: Atthābhimukhaṃ namanato, attani catthassa nāmanato nāmaṃ, dabbābhidhānaṃ.
anya-e0805n:699_1: tividhaṃ pumitthinapuṃsakaliṅgavasena. Yathā – rukkho, mālā, dhanaṃ.
anya-e0805n:700_0: Catubbidhaṃ sāmaññaguṇakriyāyadicchāvasena, yathā – rukkho, nīlo, pācako, sirivaḍḍhotiādi.
anya-e0805n:703_0: Tattha paṭhamaṃ akārantamhā pulliṅgā jātinimittā purisasaddā syādivibhattiyo parā yojīyante.
anya-e0805n:705_1: Tattha pañca māre jitavāti jino, buddho.
anya-e0805n:705_4: tepiṭakassa buddhavacanassa māgadhikāya sabhāvaniruttiyā yuttaṃ anurūpamevāti idaṃ adhikāratthaṃ veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n:711_2: tathā tathā idha liṅgaṃ nipaccate ṭhapīyati.
anya-e0805n:711_3: Casaddena dhātavo cāti jinavacanānurūpato “purisa”iti liṅge ṭhapite tato tassa dhātuppaccayavibhattivajjitassa
anya-e0805n:714_0: Tato jinavacanayuttehi liṅgehi parā vibhattiyo honti.
anya-e0805n:715_0: Kā ca pana tā vibhattiyo? “Vibhattiyo”ti adhikāro.
anya-e0805n:716_0: 63. Siyo, aṃyo, nāhi, sanaṃ, smāhi, sanaṃ, smiṃsu.
anya-e0805n:719_3: itarathā purimasutte casaddena saññākaraṇe appakataniratthakavidhippasaṅgo siyā.
anya-e0805n:720_2: Idha pana padanipphādanampi jinavacanassāvirodhenāti ñāpetuṃ paribhāsantaramāha.
anya-e0805n:722_0: Yathā yathā tesaṃ jinavacanānaṃ uparodho na hoti,
anya-e0805n:722_4: Teneva idha ca ākhyāte ca dvivacanāggahaṇaṃ,
anya-e0805n:725_1: Tatthāpi aniyamenekavacanabahuvacanappasaṅge “ekamhī vattabbe ekavacana”nti paribhāsato liṅgatthassekattavacanicchāyaṃ paṭhamekavacanaṃ si.
anya-e0805n:728_0: Si, oiti dvipadamidaṃ. Liṅgassa akārato parassa sivacanassa okāro hoti.
anya-e0805n:729_0: Suttesu hi paṭhamāniddiṭṭhassa kāriyino chaṭṭhīvipariṇāmena vivaraṇaṃ ādesāpekkhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n:730_0: Ettha ca sīti vibhatti gayhate vibhattikāriyavidhippakaraṇato,
anya-e0805n:730_2: evaṃ sabbattha syādīnaṃ kāriyavidhāne vibhattiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n:731_0: “Vā paro asarūpā”ti paralope sampatte tadapavādena pubbalopamāha.
anya-e0805n:733_2: saralope kate tu parasarassa pakatibhāvo hoti.
anya-e0805n:733_3: Ettha ca “saralope”ti punaggahaṇaṃ imināva katasaralopanimitteyeva parassa vikāre sampatte pakatibhāvatthaṃ.
anya-e0805n:733_4: Parasarassa pakatibhāvavidhānasāmatthiyato amādesappaccayādibhūte sare paretipi siddhaṃ.
anya-e0805n:739_0: Puriso ca puriso cāti purisa purisaiti vattabbe –
anya-e0805n:741_0: Sarūpānaṃ samānarūpānaṃ padabyañjanānaṃ majjhe ekova sissate,
anya-e0805n:741_2: Ettha ca “sarūpāna”nti vuttattāva siddhe asakimpayoge punāsakiṃgahaṇaṃ ekavibhattivisayānamevāsakimpayoge evāyanti dassanatthaṃ,
anya-e0805n:741_4: “Vaggā pañcapañcaso mantā”ti ettha “pañcapañcaso”ti niddeseneva vicchāpayogasiddhiyā ñāpitattā,
anya-e0805n:744_0: Tattheva liṅgatthassa bahuttavacanicchāyaṃ “bahumhi vattabbe bahuvacana”nti paṭhamābahuvacanaṃ yo,
anya-e0805n:746_1: dutiyāyonīnañca yayākkamaṃ ākārekārādesā honti vāti ākāro,
anya-e0805n:747_0: Vā icceva rūpā rūpāni, aggayo, munayo.
anya-e0805n:750_0: Asantaṃ jhe katatte tu, vidhiṃ dīpeti vāsuti.
anya-e0805n:753_2: Tasmiṃ ālapanatthādhike liṅgatthābhidhānamatte ca paṭhamāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n:756_0: Ālapanatthe vihito si gasañño hotīti gasaññāyaṃ “bho ge tū”ti ito “ge”ti vattate.
anya-e0805n:758_0: Liṅgassa sambandhī akāro ca pitusatthuiccevamādīnamanto ca ākārattamāpajjate ge pare.
anya-e0805n:761_0: Liṅgassa sambandhī ākāro rassamāpajjate ge pare vikappena, adūraṭṭhassālapanevāyaṃ.
anya-e0805n:763_2: ghate cā”ti evamādīhi niddiṭṭhehi añño seso nāma,
anya-e0805n:763_5: ettha ca satipi siggahaṇe vaiti vacanameva ñāpakamaññatthāpi siggahaṇe ālapanāggahaṇassa.
anya-e0805n:763_6: Keci ālapanābhibyattiyā bhavantasaddaṃ vā hesaddaṃ vā payujjante.
anya-e0805n:764_0: Bahuvacane na viseso, bhavanto purisā tiṭṭhatha.
anya-e0805n:767_0: Yaṃ vā karoti, yaṃ vā vikaroti, yaṃ vā pāpuṇāti, taṃ kārakaṃ kriyānimittaṃ kammasaññaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n:769_2: “saralopo”tiādinā sare lutte “dīgha”nti dīghe sampatte pakatibhāvo ca,
anya-e0805n:773_0: Yo attappadhāno kriyaṃ karoti, so kattusañño hoti.
anya-e0805n:776_0: Kattari ca kārake tatiyāvibhatti hotīti tatiyekavacanaṃ nā.
anya-e0805n:778_1: Akārantato liṅgamhā parassa nāvacanassa enādeso hoti,
anya-e0805n:781_0: Su, hiiccetesu vibhattirūpesu paresu liṅgassa sambandhī akāro ettamāpajjate.
anya-e0805n:783_0: Sabbato liṅgamhā smā hi smiṃiccetesaṃ yathākkamaṃ mhā, bhi,
anya-e0805n:786_0: Yena vā kayirate, yena vā passati, yena vā suṇāti, taṃ kārakaṃ karaṇasaññaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n:788_2: āviṭṭhena purisena so puññaṃ karoti, purisehi,
anya-e0805n:790_0: 84. Yassa dātukāmo rocate dhārayate vā taṃ sampadānaṃ.
anya-e0805n:791_0: Yassa vā dātukāmo, yassa vā rocate, yassa vā dhārayate, taṃ kārakaṃ sampadānasaññaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n:793_0: Sampadānakārake catutthīvibhatti hotīti catutthiyā ekavacanaṃ sa.
anya-e0805n:795_0: Sabbato liṅgamhā sakārāgamo hoti se vibhattimhi pare. Purisassa dhanaṃ dadāti.
anya-e0805n:798_0: Su naṃ hiiccetesu paresu liṅgassa antabhūtā sabbe rassasarā dīghamāpajjante,
anya-e0805n:801_0: Yasmā vā avadhibhūtā apeti, yasmā vā bhayaṃ, yasmā vā ādatte, taṃ kārakaṃ apādānasaññaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n:803_0: Apādānakārake pañcamīvibhatti hotīti pañcamiyā ekavacanaṃ smā.
anya-e0805n:806_0: Akārantato liṅgamhā sabbesaṃ smā smiṃiccetesaṃ yathākkamaṃ ākārekārādesā honti vā,
anya-e0805n:807_0: Bahuvacane sabbattha tatiyāsamaṃ, hissa bhiādeso hoti. Purisehi, purisebhi apeti.
anya-e0805n:810_0: Yassa vā pariggaho, taṃ sāmisaññaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n:812_1: Ṭhapetvā āyādesaṃ sabbattha catutthīchaṭṭhīnaṃ samānaṃ rūpaṃ.
anya-e0805n:815_0: Yo kattukammānaṃ kriyāya ādhāro, taṃ kārakaṃ okāsasaññaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n:817_0: Okāsakārake sattamīvibhatti hotīti sattamiyā ekavacanaṃ smiṃ,
anya-e0805n:825_0: Āloka loka nilayā’nila cāga yogā, vāyāma gāma
anya-e0805n:828_0: Sārambha thambha mada māna pamāda makkhā.
anya-e0805n:834_0: Manogaṇādissa tu nāsasmāsmiṃsu viseso. Aññattha purisasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n:835_0: Mano, manā, he mana he manā vā, bhavanto manā, manaṃ, mane.
anya-e0805n:841_0: Eteheva manogaṇādīhi sare pare sāgamo hoti vā. Manasā, manena.
anya-e0805n:842_1: tena “mano manā manaṃ mane manaāyatana”ntiādīsu na hoti.
anya-e0805n:845_0: Manogaṇādito parassa sassa vibhattissa okāro hoti vā. Sāgamo.
anya-e0805n:855_0: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa āādeso hoti simhi vibhattimhi. Guṇavā.
anya-e0805n:858_0: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa ntoādeso hoti vā yomhi paṭhame, guṇavanto tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0805n:861_0: Ntupaccayassa anto ukāro attamāpajjate sunaṃhi yoiccetesu,
anya-e0805n:861_1: caggahaṇena aññesu aṃ nā smāsmiṃsu ca.
anya-e0805n:861_3: chaṭṭhiyā siddhepi antādese puna antaggahaṇakaraṇato yonaṃ ikāro ca kvaci.
anya-e0805n:864_0: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa aṃ avaṇṇaiccete ādesā honti ge pare.
anya-e0805n:865_0: Bho guṇavaṃ bho guṇava bho guṇavā, bhavanto guṇavanto guṇavantā, guṇavantaṃ, guṇavante.
anya-e0805n:868_0: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa toti tāādesā honti vā sasmiṃnāiccetesu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ.
anya-e0805n:870_0: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa ntassaiccayamādeso hoti vā se vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n:872_0: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa taṃādeso hoti vā naṃmhi vibhattimhi. Guṇavataṃ guṇavantānaṃ.
anya-e0805n:875_0: Evaṃ gaṇavā kulavā balavā yasavā dhanavā sutavā bhagavā himavā phalavā sīlavā paññavā iccādayo.
anya-e0805n:879_0: Ntupaccayassa anto attaṃ hoti vā simhi vibhattimhi. Himavanto, himavā, sesaṃ samaṃ.
anya-e0805n:881_0: Evaṃ satimā dhitimā gatimā matimā mutimā muttimā jutimā sirimā hirimā thutimā ratimā yatimā sucimā kalimā
anya-e0805n:881_1: balimā kasimā rucimā buddhimā cakkhumā bandhumā hetumā setumā ketumā rāhumā bhāṇumā khāṇumā vijjumā iccādayo.
anya-e0805n:882_0: Tattha satimantu bandhumantusaddānaṃ aṃsesu rūpabhedo. “Attaṃ, ntussā”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n:884_0: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa attaṃ hoti vā aṃsaiccetesu.
anya-e0805n:888_0: Gacchanticcevamādīnaṃ antappaccayantānaṃ ntasaddo aṃrūpaṃ āpajjate vā simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n:891_0: Gacchantādīnaṃ ntasaddo ntupaccayova daṭṭhabbo sesesu vibhattippaccayesu,
anya-e0805n:892_1: bho gacchaṃ bho gaccha bho gacchā,
anya-e0805n:893_0: Evaṃ mahaṃ caraṃ tiṭṭhaṃ, dadaṃ bhuñjaṃ suṇaṃ pacaṃ;
anya-e0805n:894_0: Jayaṃ jīraṃ cavaṃ mīyaṃ, saraṃ kubbaṃ japaṃ vajaṃ –
anya-e0805n:896_0: Bhavantasaddassa ga yo nā savacanesu viseso. So bhavaṃ.
anya-e0805n:899_0: Bhavantaiccetassa vakārassa obhāvo hoti kvaci yoiccetesu. Te bhonto bhavanto bhavantā.
anya-e0805n:902_0: Sabbasseva bhavantasaddassa bho hoti ge pare.
anya-e0805n:904_0: Bhotā bhavatā bhavantena, bhoto bhavato bhavantassa iccādi.
anya-e0805n:906_0: Sabbasseva bhadantasaddassa bhaddanta bhanteiccete ādesā honti kvaci ge pare yosu ca.
anya-e0805n:908_0: Sabbasseva santasaddassa sasaddādeso hoti bhakāre pare, ante ca bakārāgamo hoti.
anya-e0805n:909_0: Casaddaggahaṇena abhakārepi samāse kvaci sakārādeso. Sabbhi.
anya-e0805n:911_0: Atthi rāja brahma atta sakhasaddādīnaṃ bhedo, tatheva syādyuppatti, “rāja si”iti ṭhite –
anya-e0805n:914_0: Brahma atta sakha rājaiccevamādito sivacanassa ākāro hoti.
anya-e0805n:916_0: Brahmattasakharājādito yonaṃ ānoādeso hoti. Rājāno tiṭṭhanti, bho rāja bho rājā, bhavanto rājāno.
anya-e0805n:919_0: Brahmādīhi parassa aṃvacanassa ānaṃ hoti vā. Rājānaṃ passa rājaṃ vā, rājāno.
anya-e0805n:922_0: Sabbasseva rājasaddassa savibhattissa raññāādeso hoti vā nāmhi vibhattimhi. Raññā kataṃ rājena vā.
anya-e0805n:924_0: Sabbassa rājasaddassa rājuādeso hoti su naṃ hiiccetesu vacanesu.
anya-e0805n:927_0: Sabbasseva rājasaddassa savibhattissa rañño rājinoiccete ādesā honti se vibhattimhi. Rañño,
anya-e0805n:930_0: Sabbasseva rājasaddassa savibhattissa raññaṃādeso hoti vā naṃmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n:937_0: Tatrāyaṃ brahmattasakhādīsu pāṭhasāmatthiyato rūpātideso. Sesaṃ tatiyāsamaṃ.
anya-e0805n:938_0: Raññā apeti, rājūhi rājūbhi, rājehi rājebhi, rañño, rājino santakaṃ, raññaṃ rājūnaṃ rājānaṃ.
anya-e0805n:941_0: Sabbasseva rājasaddassa savibhattissa raññerājiniiccete ādesā honti smiṃmhi vibhattimhi. Raññe,
anya-e0805n:942_0: Brahmasaddassa ca ga nā sa smiṃsu viseso. Brahmā, brahmāno.
anya-e0805n:948_0: Brahmasaddassa anto uttamāpajjate sa nāiccetesu vacanesu.
anya-e0805n:951_0: Jhalasaññehi ivaṇṇuvaṇṇehi parassa saiccetassa vacanassa noiccādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0805n:952_0: Pañcamiyaṃ nābhāvātideso. Brahmunā, brahmehi brahmebhi, brahmuno brahmassa, brahmānaṃ brahmūnaṃ vā.
anya-e0805n:954_0: Brahmasaddato smiṃvacanassa ni hoti. Tusaddena kammacammamuddhādito ca kvaci. Brahmani, brahmesu.
anya-e0805n:956_0: Attā, attāno, bho atta bho attā, bhavanto attāno, attānaṃ attaṃ, attāno.
anya-e0805n:957_0: Nāmhi “akammantassa cā”ti ettha casaddena attantassa attaṃ vā. Attanā attena vā.
anya-e0805n:959_0: Attasaddassa anto anattamāpajjate hismiṃ pare. Attanehi attanebhi.
anya-e0805n:962_0: Tato attasaddato sassa vibhattissa no hoti. Attano, attānaṃ.
anya-e0805n:964_0: Tato attasaddato smāvacanassa nā hoti. Attanā apeti.
anya-e0805n:965_0: Nābhāvātideseneva siddhepi uttarasuttena ekayogamakatvā bhinnayogakaraṇaṃ atthantaraviññāpanatthaṃ,
anya-e0805n:968_0: Tato attasaddato smiṃvacanassa ni hoti. Attani, attesu.
anya-e0805n:972_0: Sakhasaddato yonaṃ āyo noādesā ca honti. Sakhāyo.
anya-e0805n:974_0: Sakhasaddantassa ikārādeso hoti nonānaṃsaiccetesu paresu. Sakhino tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0805n:977_0: Sakhato gassa akāra ākāra ikāra īkāraekārādesā honti.
anya-e0805n:978_0: A ca ā ca i ca ī ca e cātipi e, pubbassarānaṃ kamena lopo.
anya-e0805n:979_0: Bho sakha bho sakhā bho sakhi bho sakhī bho sakhe, bhavanto sakhāno sakhāyo sakhino.
anya-e0805n:982_0: Sakhantassa āro bhoti vā sunaṃ aṃiccetesu paresu.
anya-e0805n:985_0: Sakhantassa āro hoti vā himhi vibhattimhi. Sakhārehi sakhārebhi, sakhehi sakhebhi.
anya-e0805n:986_0: Ikārādese “jhalato sassa no vā”ti no. Sakhino sakhissa, sakhārānaṃ sakhīnaṃ.
anya-e0805n:990_0: Sakhato smiṃvacanassa ekāro hoti. Niccatthoyamārambho. Sakhe, sakhāresu sakhesu.
anya-e0805n:991_0: Ātumasaddassa paṭhamādutiyāsu attasaddasseva rūpanayo. Ātumā, ātumāno,
anya-e0805n:995_0: Pumasaddassa savibhattissa ākārādeso hoti simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n:998_0: Pumantassa savibhattissa ānoādeso hoti yosu vibhattīsu. Pumāno.
anya-e0805n:1000_0: Pumantassa savibhattissa aṃ hoti ālapanekavacane pare. He pumaṃ, he pumāno, pumaṃ, pumāno.
anya-e0805n:1003_0: Pumantassa āuādesā honti vā nāmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n:1007_0: Casaddena yuvamaghavādīnamantassa vā ānādeso hoti sabbavibhattīsu.
anya-e0805n:1007_1: “U nāmhi cā”ti ettha casaddena pumantassukāro vā sasmāsu vibhattīsu.
anya-e0805n:1012_0: Pumantassa savibhattissa āneādeso hoti vā smiṃmhi vibhattimhi. Pumāne pume pumasmiṃ pumamhi.
anya-e0805n:1014_0: Pumantassa suiccetasmiṃ pare āādeso hoti vā. Pumāsu pumesu.
anya-e0805n:1016_0: “Pumantassā simhī”ti ettha antaggahaṇena ākāro, “hivibhattimhi cā”ti sutte casaddena ānādeso ca.
anya-e0805n:1017_2: he yuva he yuvā he yuvāna he yuvānā,
anya-e0805n:1018_0: “Akammantassa cā”ti ettha casaddena yuvamaghavādīnamantassa ā hoti vā nāsuiccetesūti āttaṃ.
anya-e0805n:1019_8: yuvāne yuvānasmiṃ yuvānamhi yuve yuvamhi yuvasmiṃ,
anya-e0805n:1020_0: Evaṃ maghavā maghavāno, maghavānā iccādi yuvasaddasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n:1026_0: Ghasaññakaākāravajjito liṅgassanto saro rassamāpajjate ekavacanesu yosu ca paresūti rassattaṃ.
anya-e0805n:1027_1: he sa he sā, he sā, saṃ, se, sena,
anya-e0805n:1030_0: Ikāranto pulliṅgo aggisaddo. Syādyuppatti, aggi si,
anya-e0805n:1033_0: Aggissa anto ini hoti vā simhi vibhattimhi. “Sesato lopaṃ gasipī”ti silopo. Aggini aggi.
anya-e0805n:1037_1: jhalasaññehi ca paresaṃ yovacanānaṃ lopo hoti vā.
anya-e0805n:1039_0: Liṅgassantabhūtā sabbe rassasarā yosu katanikāralopesu dīghamāpajjante.
anya-e0805n:1039_1: Katā nikāralopā yesaṃ te katanikāralopā. Aggī.
anya-e0805n:1042_0: Yosu paresu akatarasso jho attamāpajjate. Aggayo.
anya-e0805n:1044_0: Ālapanepevaṃ. He aggi, he aggī he aggayo.
anya-e0805n:1047_0: Jhalapaiccetehi parassa aṃvacanassa, makārassa ca niggahītaṃ ādeso hoti. Aggiṃ.
anya-e0805n:1049_0: “Jhalato sassa no vā”ti no. Aggino aggissa, aggīnaṃ.
anya-e0805n:1052_0: Joti pāṇi gaṇṭhi muṭṭhi, kucchi vatthi sāli vīhi;
anya-e0805n:1053_0: Byādhi odhi bodhi sandhi, rāsi kesi sāti dīpi.
anya-e0805n:1054_0: Isi muni maṇi dhani yati giri ravi kavi,
anya-e0805n:1055_0: Kapi asi masi nidhi vidhi ahi kimi pati;
anya-e0805n:1056_0: Hari ari timi kali bali jaladhi gahapati,
anya-e0805n:1062_0: “Agho rassamekavacanayosvapi cā”ti rassatte sampatte etthevāpiggahaṇena sismiṃ tadabhāve siddhe niyamatthamāha.
anya-e0805n:1065_0: Sismiṃ napuṃsakavajjitāni liṅgāni na rassamāpajjanteti rassattābhāvo, silopo. Daṇḍī tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0805n:1074_0: Sabbesaṃ yonaṃ sālapanānaṃ jhato katarassā paresaṃ noiccādeso hoti. Daṇḍino tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0805n:1082_0: Jhalapaiccete rassamāpajjante ge pare. Bho daṇḍi.
anya-e0805n:1084_0: Dutiyāyaṃ rassatte kate “a”miti vattate, “ghapato smiṃ yaṃ vā”ti ito maṇḍūkagatiyā “vā”ti vattate.
anya-e0805n:1086_0: Jhato katarassā parassa aṃvacanassa naṃ hoti vā.
anya-e0805n:1087_0: “Jhalato cā”ti nā. Daṇḍinā daṇḍismā daṇḍimhā, daṇḍīhi daṇḍībhi, daṇḍino daṇḍissa, daṇḍīnaṃ.
anya-e0805n:1088_0: “Jhato, katarassā”ti ca vattate, pure viya “vā”ti ca.
anya-e0805n:1090_0: Jhato katarassā parassa smiṃvacanassa niiccādeso hoti vā. Daṇḍini daṇḍismiṃ daṇḍimhi, daṇḍīsu.
anya-e0805n:1092_0: Dhammī saṅghī ñāṇī hatthī, cakkī pakkhī dāṭhī raṭṭhī;
anya-e0805n:1093_0: Chattī mālī vammī yogī, bhāgī bhogī kāmī sāmī.
anya-e0805n:1094_0: Dhajī gaṇī sasī kuṭṭhī, jaṭī yānī sukhī sikhī;
anya-e0805n:1095_0: Dantī mantī karī cāgī, kusalī musalī balī.
anya-e0805n:1101_0: Sesaṃ daṇḍīsamaṃ. Niādesābhāvova viseso. Evaṃ senānī sudhīppabhutayo.
anya-e0805n:1104_0: Tatheva bhikkhusaddato si, silopo. So bhikkhu.
anya-e0805n:1105_0: Bahuvacane “ghapato ca yonaṃ lopo”ti yolopo, “yosu kata”iccādinā dīgho. Te bhikkhū.
anya-e0805n:1108_0: Lasaññato paresaṃ yovacanānaṃ vokārādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0805n:1108_4: tena jantusabbaññūādito yonaṃ no ca hoti.
anya-e0805n:1110_0: Vibhāsā na ca vo no ca, amuppabhutito bhave.
anya-e0805n:1113_0: Ve voiccetesu ca paresu akatarasso lo attamāpajjate. Bhikkhavo, bho bhikkhu, bhavanto bhikkhū.
anya-e0805n:1116_0: Akatarassā lato parassa ālapane vihitassa yoiccetassa ve voādesā honti. Attaṃ.
anya-e0805n:1118_0: Evaṃ setu ketu rāhu bhānu paṅgu ucchu veḷu maccu sindhu bandhu neru meru sattu kāru hetu jantu ruru paṭu iccādayo.
anya-e0805n:1125_0: Satthu pitu mātu bhātu dhītu kattuiccevamādīnamanto āttamāpajjate sismiṃ, silopo ca hoti. Satthā.
anya-e0805n:1128_0: Satthu pitādīnamanto sivacanato aññesu vacanesu ārattamāpajjate.
anya-e0805n:1131_0: Tato ārādesato sabbesaṃ yonaṃ okārādeso hoti.
anya-e0805n:1132_0: Tuggahaṇena aññehipi catuubhanadīgavādīhi yonamokāro hoti, saralopādi. Satthāro.
anya-e0805n:1133_1: “Ge rassa”nti adhikicca “ākāro vā”ti vikappena rassattaṃ, valopo.
anya-e0805n:1136_0: Tato ārādesato nāvacanassa ākārādeso hoti. Satthārā,
anya-e0805n:1139_0: Satthu pituiccevamādīnamantassa uttaṃ hoti vā sasmiṃ,
anya-e0805n:1142_0: Satthu pituādīnamanto ārattamāpajjate vā naṃmhi vibhattimhi. Satthārānaṃ.
anya-e0805n:1145_1: pitādīnamantassa ca attaṃ hoti vā naṃmhi vibhattimhi,
anya-e0805n:1149_1: Puna tatoggahaṇena aññasmāpi smiṃvacanassa ikāro. Yathā – bhuvi, divi.
anya-e0805n:1151_0: Ārādeso rassamāpajjate ikāre pare, satthari, satthāresu.
anya-e0805n:1154_0: Bhattu vattu netu sotu, ñātu jetu chettu bhettu. Dātu dhātu nattu boddhu, viññāpetu ādayopi.
anya-e0805n:1158_0: Pitusaddassa bhedo. Simhi āttaṃ, silopo, pitā.
anya-e0805n:1161_2: tena toādimhi pitādīnamikāro ca. Yathā – pitito, mātito, bhātito, dhītito,
anya-e0805n:1162_7: Bhāvaniddesena ārādesābhāve pitūhi pitūbhi pituhi pitubhi,
anya-e0805n:1162_11: pitarehi pitarebhi pitūhi pitūbhi pituhi pitubhi,
anya-e0805n:1166_0: Tatheva syādyuppatti, silopo. So abhibhū, yolope kate te abhibhū.
anya-e0805n:1170_3: “lato vokāro cā”ti ettha kāraggahaṇena yonaṃ noādeso.
anya-e0805n:1171_0: Evaṃ maggaññū dhammaññū atthaññū kālaññū rattaññū mattaññū kataññū tathaññū viññū vidū vedagū pāragū iccādayo.
anya-e0805n:1180_0: Goiccetassa okārassa āva avaiccete ādesā honti aṃmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n:1180_1: Seddena yo nā sa smāsmiṃsuiccetesu ca avādeso hoti.
anya-e0805n:1183_0: Āvaiccetassa gāvādesassa antasarassa ukārādeso hoti vā aṃmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n:1186_0: Su hi nāiccetesu sabbassa gosaddassa goṇādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0805n:1186_2: he goṇa he goṇā, goṇaṃ, goṇe, goṇena,
anya-e0805n:1188_0: Sabbassa gosaddassa goṇādeso hoti vā naṃmhi vibhattimhi. Goṇānaṃ,
anya-e0805n:1191_0: “Go āva se”iti tipadamidaṃ. Gossa o go, gosaddokārassa āvādeso hoti se vibhattimhi. Gāvassa gavassa.
anya-e0805n:1194_0: Tato gosaddato parassa naṃvacanassa aṃādeso hoti,
anya-e0805n:1194_1: gosaddokārassa avādeso ca patimhi pare alutte ca samāse.
anya-e0805n:1195_1: “No ca dvādito naṃmhī”ti sutte casaddena nakārāgamo ca.
anya-e0805n:1196_0: Gāvā gāvamhā gāvasmā gavā gavamhā gavasmā,
anya-e0805n:1196_4: gāve gāvamhi gāvasmiṃ gave gavamhi gavasmiṃ,
anya-e0805n:1198_0: Puriso guṇavā rājā, sā’ggi daṇḍī ca bhikkhu ca;
anya-e0805n:1202_0: Itthiyaṃ “tā si” itīdha sādesasilopā. Sā kaññā, nattaṃ.
anya-e0805n:1202_1: Nā tā nāyo tāyo, naṃ taṃ,
anya-e0805n:1203_0: “Etimāsamī”ti ito etimāggahaṇañca “tassā vā”ti ito taggahaṇañca pañcamiyantavasena vattate “vā”ti ca.
anya-e0805n:1205_0: Tato tā etā imāto parassa sassa vibhattissa ssāyādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0805n:1208_0: Tāiccetassa itthiyaṃ vattamānassa antassa ikāro hoti vā saṃ sāsvekavacanesu vibhattādesesu.
anya-e0805n:1208_1: Tissāya tassāya assāya nassāya assā nassā tissā tassā nāya tāya,
anya-e0805n:1209_0: Pañcamīchaṭṭhīsu tatiyācatutthīsamaṃ. Sattamiyaṃ assaṃ nassaṃ tissaṃ tassaṃ nāyaṃ tāyaṃ, nāsu tāsu.
anya-e0805n:1211_0: Eta si, “etatesaṃ to”ti sakārādeso. Eso puriso, ete, etaṃ, ete iccādi sabbasaddasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n:1212_0: Itthiyaṃ etā si, sādeso. Esā kaññā, etā etāyo, etaṃ, etā etāyo, etāya, etāhi etābhi.
anya-e0805n:1215_1: etā imāiccetesamanto saro ikāro hoti saṃsāsvekavacanesu vibhattādesesu.
anya-e0805n:1218_0: Napuṃsake etaṃ, etāni, etaṃ, etāni, sesaṃ ñeyyaṃ.
anya-e0805n:1222_0: Imasaddassa sabbasseva anapuṃsakassa ayaṃādeso hoti simhi vibhattimhi, silopo.
anya-e0805n:1224_0: Imasaddassa sabbasseva ana imiādesā honti nāmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n:1227_0: Sabbassa imasaddassa ekāro hoti vā su naṃ hiiccetesu vacanesu.
anya-e0805n:1233_0: Imasaddassa ca sabbasseva attaṃ hoti vā sa smā smiṃsaṃ sāiccetesu vacanesu sabbattha liṅgesu.
anya-e0805n:1236_9: “tesu vuddhilopā”dinā smiṃvacanassa vā sādeso. Imāyaṃ, imāsu.
anya-e0805n:1237_0: Napuṃsake ima si, “savibhattissa, vā”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n:1239_0: Napuṃsake vattamānassa sabbasseva imasaddassa savibhattissa idaṃ hoti vā aṃ sisu paresu.
anya-e0805n:1240_3: ehi ebhi imehi imebhi iccādi pulliṅge viya ñeyyaṃ.
anya-e0805n:1244_0: Anapuṃsakassa amusaddassa makāro sakāramāpajjate vā simhi pare. Asu rājā.
anya-e0805n:1247_0: Sabbato sabbanāmato paro kaiccayamāgamo hoti vā.
anya-e0805n:1247_2: “Amussa mo sa”nti vinādhikārena yogena kakārepi sādeso.
anya-e0805n:1248_0: Asuko, asukā, asukaṃ. Sādesābhāve amuko, amukā, amukaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n:1249_0: Bahuvacane “lato vokāro cā”ti sutte anuvattamānavāggahaṇena vokāro na hoti, niccaṃ yolopo, dīgho ca.
anya-e0805n:1253_0: Napuṃsake amusi. “Savibhattissa”, imassidamiccādito “aṃsisu napuṃsake”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n:1255_0: Napuṃsake vattamānassa sabbasseva amusaddassa savibhattissa aduṃ hoti aṃsisu paresu.
anya-e0805n:1257_0: “Kissa ka ve cā”ti ito “kissa, ka”iti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n:1259_0: Kimiccetassa kasaddo ādeso hoti vappaccayato sesesu vibhattibhedesu.
anya-e0805n:1259_1: Ettha ca “kissa ka ve cā”ti sutte casaddena vappaccayāvasiṭṭha thamādippaccayānaṃ gahitattā sesaggahaṇena vibhattiyova gayhante.
anya-e0805n:1260_0: Ko eso, ke, kaṃ, ke, kena,
anya-e0805n:1261_0: Itthiyaṃ “kiṃ si”itīdha “sesesu cā”ti vibhattiyaṃ parāyaṃ kādese kate “itthiyamato āppaccayo”ti majjhe āppaccayo, silopo.
anya-e0805n:1262_0: Kā esā kaññā, kā kāyo, kaṃ, kā kāyo iccādi sabbāsaddasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n:1263_1: lopavidhissa balavatarattā paṭhamaṃ silope kate puna vibhattiparattābhāvā,
anya-e0805n:1263_2: “tadanuparodhenā”ti paribhāsato vā kādesābhāvo. Kiṃ etaṃ, kāni.
anya-e0805n:1264_0: Dutiyekavacane “kvaci lopa”nti niggahītalope kate “aṃmo niggahītaṃ jhalapehī”ti niggahītaṃ. Kiṃ,
anya-e0805n:1267_0: “Ubha yo” itīdha “tato yonamo tū”ti ettha tuggahaṇena kvaci yonamokāro.
anya-e0805n:1270_0: Ubhinnaṃ, ubhohi ubhobhi ubhehi ubhebhi, ubhinnaṃ, ubhosu ubhesu.
anya-e0805n:1271_0: Dviādayo saṅkhyāsaṅkhyeyyavacanā, bahūnaṃ vācitattā sadā bahuvacanantāva.
anya-e0805n:1274_0: Dviiccetassa saṅkhyāsaddassa itthipumanapuṃsake vattamānassa savibhattissa dveiccādeso hoti yosu paresu.
anya-e0805n:1277_0: Dviiccevamādito saṅkhyāto nakārāgamo hoti naṃmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n:1277_1: Casaddaggahaṇena itthiyaṃ ti ca tusaddato ssañcāgamo naṃmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n:1281_0: 230. Ti catunnaṃ tisso catasso tayocattārotīṇi cattāri.
anya-e0805n:1282_0: Ti catunnaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ itthipumanapuṃsake vattamānānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ yathākkamaṃ tisso catasso tayo cattārotīṇi cattāriiccete ādesā honti yosu paresu.
anya-e0805n:1285_0: Tiiccetasmā saṅkhyāsaddā parassa naṃvacanassa iṇṇaṃ iṇṇannaṃiccete ādesā honti,
anya-e0805n:1288_1: “tato yonamo tū”ti ettha tusaddena kvaci okāro ca.
anya-e0805n:1302_0: Tesaṃ panāliṅgattā tīsu liṅgesu samānarūpaṃ. “Tumhamha”iti ṭhite syādyuppatti.
anya-e0805n:1305_0: Sabbesaṃ tumhaamhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ yathākkamaṃ tvaṃahaṃiccete ādesā honti simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n:1306_0: Bahuvacane “sabbanāmakārate paṭhamo”ti ekāro. Tumhe tiṭṭhatha, bhiyyo amhe mahemase.
anya-e0805n:1309_0: Sabbassa amhasaddassa savibhattissa mayaṃādeso hoti yomhi paṭhame. Mayaṃ gacchāma.
anya-e0805n:1310_0: Ettha ca ekasmimpi gāravabahumānena bahuttasamāropā bahuvacanaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n:1313_0: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tavaṃ mamaṃiccete ādesā honti navā yathākkamaṃ aṃmhi vibhattimhi. Tavaṃ,
anya-e0805n:1315_0: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ taṃ maṃiccete ādesā honti yathākkamaṃ aṃmhi vibhattimhi. Taṃ, maṃ.
anya-e0805n:1317_0: Sabbassa tumhasaddassa savibhattissa tuvaṃtvaṃiccete ādesā honti aṃmhi vibhattimhi. Tuvaṃ tvaṃ.
anya-e0805n:1320_0: Tumhamhehi paro appaṭhamo yo ākaṃ hoti vā.
anya-e0805n:1322_0: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tayā mayāiccete ādesā honti yathākkamaṃ nāmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n:1324_0: Tayā tayiiccetesaṃ takāro tvattamāpajjate vā. Tvayā tayā, mayā, tumhehi tumhebhi, amhehi amhebhi.
anya-e0805n:1327_0: Tumhamhehi sassa vibhattissa amādeso hoti vā. Tumhaṃ, amhaṃ dīyate.
anya-e0805n:1329_0: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ yathākkamaṃ tavamamaiccete ādesā honti se vibhattimhi,
anya-e0805n:1332_0: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ yathākkamaṃ tuyhaṃmayhaṃiccete ādesā ca honti se vibhattimhi. Tava,
anya-e0805n:1334_0: Sabbasseva amhasaddassa savibhattissa mamaṃādeso hoti se vibhattimhi. Mamaṃ dīyate.
anya-e0805n:1337_0: Tumhamhehi parassa naṃvacanassa ākamiccādeso hoti, añca.
anya-e0805n:1341_0: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ tayi mayiiccete ādesā honti yathākkamaṃ smiṃmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n:1342_0: Tesaṃ eva tumha amhasaddānaṃ padato paresaṃ kvaci ādesantaravidhāne rūpabhedo.
anya-e0805n:1345_0: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ padasmā paresaṃ vo noādesā honti yathākkamaṃ dutiyācatutthīchaṭṭhīsu bahuvacanesu navā.
anya-e0805n:1346_0: Navāti kiṃ? Bhayaṃ tumhāka no siyā, eso amhākaṃ satthā.
anya-e0805n:1349_0: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ padasmā paresaṃ te meādesā honti yathākkamaṃ catutthīchaṭṭhīsu ekavacanesu navā.
anya-e0805n:1350_0: Navāti kiṃ? Idaṃ cīvaraṃ tuyhaṃ vikappanatthāya dammi, suṇātha vacanaṃ mama.
anya-e0805n:1352_0: Vo no te meti ye ime;
anya-e0805n:1356_0: Na socāmi na rodāmi, tava sutvāna māṇava;
anya-e0805n:1358_0: Evamidaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ mamañceva tumhākañcāti.
anya-e0805n:1359_0: Padatoti kiṃ? Tava ñāti, mama ñāti.
anya-e0805n:1362_0: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ padasmā paresaṃ te meādesā na honti aṃmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0805n:1365_0: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ padasmā paresaṃ te me ādesā honti vā yathākkamaṃ tatiyekavacane pare.
anya-e0805n:1368_0: Sabbesaṃ tumha amhasaddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ padasmā paresaṃ vo noādesā honti vā yathākkamaṃ tatiyābahuvacane pare.
anya-e0805n:1369_0: Bahuvacananiddesena kvaci yomhi paṭhame ca vo no honti. Gāmaṃ vo gaccheyyātha, gāmaṃ no gaccheyyāma.
anya-e0805n:1372_0: “Yosu dvinnaṃ dve cā”ti ito “yosū”ti vattate, “itthipumanapuṃsakasaṅkhya”nti ca.
anya-e0805n:1374_1: pañcādīnaṃ aṭṭhārasantānaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ itthipumanapuṃsake vattamānānamantassa savibhattissa akāro hoti yosu paresu.
anya-e0805n:1377_0: Pañcādīnamaṭṭhārasantānaṃ saṅkhyānamanto attamāpajjate su naṃ hiiccetesu paresu.
anya-e0805n:1377_6: Evaṃ cha sa tta aṭṭhanava dasasaddā.
anya-e0805n:1378_0: “Ekañca dasa cā”ti atthe dvandasamāse, “ekena adhikā dasā”ti atthe tappurise vā kate
anya-e0805n:1381_0: Dviekaaṭṭhaiccetesamanto ākāro hoti vā saṅkhyāne uttarapade pare.
anya-e0805n:1385_0: Ekādito saṅkhyāto parassa dasassa ādissa dassa rakāro hoti vā saṅkhyāne.
anya-e0805n:1386_0: Dve ca dasa ca, dvīhi vā adhikā dasāti dvidasa itīdha –
anya-e0805n:1389_0: Vīsati dasaiccetesu paresu dvisaddassa bā hoti vā.
anya-e0805n:1389_1: Tusaddena tiṃsāyampi. Rakāro, āttañca. Bārasa, dvādasa.
anya-e0805n:1391_0: Cattāro ca dasa ca, catūhi vā adhikā dasāti catuddasa iccatra –
anya-e0805n:1393_0: 256. Catūpapadassa lopo tuttarapadādi cassa cu copi navā.
anya-e0805n:1394_0: Gaṇane dasassādimhi ṭhitassa catuiccetassa upapadassa tusaddo lopo hoti,
anya-e0805n:1394_1: uttarapadādimhi ṭhitassa catūpapadassa cakārassa cu coādesā honti navā. Cuddasa, coddasa,
anya-e0805n:1395_1: cu co honti navā. Yathā – tālīsaṃ,
anya-e0805n:1396_1: pañcahi vā adhikā dasāti atthe pañcadasa.
anya-e0805n:1396_2: “Tesu vuddhī”tiādinā pañcasaddassa dasa vīsatīsu kvaci pannapaṇṇaādesā.
anya-e0805n:1397_0: Cha ca dasa ca, chahi vā adhikā dasāti atthe chadasa itīdha –
anya-e0805n:1400_0: Chaiccetassa saṅkhyāsaddassa niccaṃ so hoti dase pare.
anya-e0805n:1405_0: Satta ca dasa ca, sattahi vā adhikā dasāti atthe sattarasa, sattadasa.
anya-e0805n:1406_0: Aṭṭha ca dasa ca, aṭṭhahi vā adhikā dasāti atthe aṭṭhadasa itīdha ātte kate –
anya-e0805n:1409_0: Aṭṭhādito ca dasasaddassa dakārassa rakāro hoti vā saṅkhyāne. Aṭṭhārasa, aṭṭhādasa.
anya-e0805n:1416_0: Tesaṃ panāliṅgattā, nipātattā ca tiliṅge, vacanadvaye ca samānaṃ rūpaṃ.
anya-e0805n:1419_0: Sabbasmā suddhanāmato, sabbanāmato ca liṅgamhā kvaci topaccayo hoti pañcamyatthe.
anya-e0805n:1421_0: Toādi yesaṃ dānipariyantānaṃ paccayānaṃ te honti paccayā tvādayo,
anya-e0805n:1422_7: ettha ca “kvacādimajjhuttarānaṃ dīgharassāpaccayesu cā”ti topaccaye rassattaṃ. Yāguto, jambuto, cittato,
anya-e0805n:1423_2: evaṃ yato, tato, katarato, katamato, itarato, aññato, ekato, ubhayato, pubbato, parato, aparato,
anya-e0805n:1426_0: Kimiccetassa ku hoti trato thaiccetesu ca paresu. Kasmā, kehīti vā kuto.
anya-e0805n:1429_0: Sabbassa etasaddassa akāro hoti vā tothaiccetesu. Etasmā, etehīti vā ato.
anya-e0805n:1432_0: Sabbassa etasaddassa ekāro hoti vā tothaiccetesu. Dvittaṃ, etto.
anya-e0805n:1435_0: Imasaddassa sabbasseva ikāro hoti thaṃdānihatodhaiccetesu ca. Imasmāti ito.
anya-e0805n:1436_3: Evaṃ majjhato, ekato, purato, pacchato, passato, piṭṭhito, pādato, sīsato, aggato, mūlato,
anya-e0805n:1437_0: Tatiyatthe aniccenāti aniccato, aniccato sammasati. Evaṃ dukkhato, rogato, gaṇḍato iccādayo.
anya-e0805n:1440_0: Sabbanāmehi parā tra thaiccete paccayā honti kvaci sattamyatthe.
anya-e0805n:1440_11: “Kissa ka ve cā”ti sutte casaddena kādeso. Kattha,
anya-e0805n:1443_0: Sabbasseva etasaddassa akāro hoti niccaṃ tre pare. Atra.
anya-e0805n:1444_0: “Kvaci, atthe, sattamiyā”ti ca adhikāro, sabbasminti atthe –
anya-e0805n:1446_0: Sabbaiccetasmā dhippaccayo hoti kvaci sattamyatthe. Sabbadhi.
anya-e0805n:1450_2: “Tesu vuddhī”tiādinā kakāre akārassa lopo ca vamhi.
anya-e0805n:1453_0: Kimiccetasmā hiṃ haṃ hiñcanaṃiccete paccayā honti kvaci sattamyatthe.
anya-e0805n:1456_0: Kimiccetassa ku hoti hiṃ haṃ iccetesu.
anya-e0805n:1459_0: Taiccetasmā ca sabbanāmato hiṃhaṃpaccayā honti kvaci sattamyatthe. Tasminti tahiṃ, tahaṃ.
anya-e0805n:1461_0: Imasaddato hadhappaccayā honti kvaci sattamyatthe. “Imassi tha”ntiādinā ikāro. Imasminti iha, idha.
anya-e0805n:1463_0: Yaiccetasmā sabbanāmato hiṃpaccayo hoti kvaci sattamyatthe. Yasminti yahiṃ.
anya-e0805n:1468_0: “Kissa ka ve cā”ti sutte casaddena kādeso, kadā.
anya-e0805n:1470_0: Sabbaiccetassa saddassa sasaddādeso hoti vā dāpaccaye pare. Sabbasmiṃ kāleti sadā, sabbadā.
anya-e0805n:1474_0: Taiccetasmā sabbanāmato dānidāpaccayā honti kāle kvaci sattamyatthe. Tasmiṃ kāleti tadāni, tadā.
anya-e0805n:1476_0: Imasaddato rahi dhunā dāniiccete paccayā honti kāle kvaci sattamyatthe.
anya-e0805n:1479_0: Sabbassa imasaddassa etādeso hoti rahimhi paccaye pare. Imasmiṃ kāleti etarahi.
anya-e0805n:1481_0: Sabbasseva imasaddassa akāro hoti dhunāpaccaye pare. Adhunā,
anya-e0805n:1485_0: Pa parā ni nī u du saṃ vi ava anu pari adhi abhi pati su ā ati api apa upa iti pīsati upasaggā.
anya-e0805n:1486_0: Tattha pasaddo pakārā’dikamma padhāni’ssariya’ntobhāvaviyoga tappara bhusattha sambhavatitti anāvila patthanādīsu.
anya-e0805n:1486_1: Paiti ayamupasaggo etesu pakārādīsu atthesu vattati, yathā –
anya-e0805n:1488_0: Niiti nissesa niggata nīharaṇa’ntopavesanā’bhāvanisedha nikkhanta pātubhāvā’vadhāraṇa vibhajana upamū’padhāraṇā’vasānachekādīsu.
anya-e0805n:1489_0: Nīiti nīharaṇā’varaṇādīsu. Nīharaṇe nīharati, āvaraṇe nīvaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0805n:1490_0: Uiti uggatu’ddhakamma padhāna viyoga sambhava atthalābhasatti sarūpakathanādīsu.
anya-e0805n:1492_0: Saṃiti samodhāna sammāsama samantabhāvasaṅgata saṅkhepabhusattha sahattha appattha pabhavā’bhimukhabhāva saṅgaha pidhāna punappunakaraṇa samiddhādīsu.
anya-e0805n:1493_0: Viiti visesa vividha viruddha vigata viyoga virūpatādīsu.
anya-e0805n:1494_0: Avaiti adhobhāga viyoga paribhava jānana suddhi nicchayadesa theyyādīsu.
anya-e0805n:1495_0: Anuiti anugatā’nupacchinna pacchattha bhusattha sādissa hīnatatiyattha lakkhaṇi’tthambhūtakkhāna bhāga vicchādīsu.
anya-e0805n:1495_10: bhāge yadettha maṃ anusiyā taṃ dīyatu,
anya-e0805n:1495_11: vicchāyaṃ rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ anu vijjotate cando.
anya-e0805n:1496_0: Pariiti samantatobhāva pariccheda vajjanā’liṅgana nivāsanapūjābhojanā’vajānana dosakkhāna lakkhaṇādīsu.
anya-e0805n:1498_0: Abhiiti abhimukhabhāva visiṭṭhā’dhi ku’ddhakamma kula sāruppavandana lakkhaṇi’tthambhūtakkhāna vicchādīsu.
anya-e0805n:1499_0: Patiiti patigata paṭilomapatinidhi patidāna nisedhanivattana sādissa patikaraṇā’dāna patibodha paṭicca lakkhaṇi’tthambhūtakkhāna bhāgavicchādīsu.
anya-e0805n:1501_0: Āiti abhimukhabhāvu’ddhakamma mariyādā’bhividhi patti’cchāparissajana ādikammaggahaṇa nivāsa samīpa’vhānādīsu.
anya-e0805n:1504_0: Apaiti apagata garaha vajjana pūjā padussanādīsu.
anya-e0805n:1505_0: Upaiti upagamana samīpū’papatti sādissā’dhikū’paribhāvā’nasana dosakkhāna saññā pubbakamma pūjā gayhākāra bhusatthādīsu.
anya-e0805n:1507_0: “Upasagga nipātā ca, paccayā ca ime tayo;
anya-e0805n:1509_0: Tattha upasaggānaṃ nāmākhyātavisesakattā liṅgasaññāyaṃ aniyamena syādimhi sampatte tesaṃ saṅkhyākammādibhedābhāvā tehi paṭhamekavacanameva bhavati.
anya-e0805n:1512_1: upasagganipātehi ca sabbāsaṃ parāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo hoti.
anya-e0805n:1512_3: Ettha ca āvusotimassa visuṃ gahaṇaṃ sasaṅkhyattadīpanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n:1515_1: evaṃ parābhavo, nivāso, nīhāro, uhāro, duhāro, saṃhāro, vihāro, avahāro, anuhāro, parihāro, adhihāro, abhihāro, patihāro, suhāro, āhāro, atihāro, apihāro, apahāro, upahāro. Paharati,
anya-e0805n:1523_0: Na no mā a alaṃ halaṃ iccete paṭisedhanatthe.
anya-e0805n:1526_0: Tattha atha khalu vata vatha atho assu yagghe hi carahi naṃ taṃ vā ca tuva vo pana have kīva ha tato
anya-e0805n:1526_1: yathā sudaṃ kho ve haṃ enaṃ seyyathidaṃ iccevamādīni padapūraṇāni.
anya-e0805n:1539_0: Āvuso ambho hambho re are hare jeiccete āmantane.
anya-e0805n:1540_0: Divā bhiyyo namo iccete paṭhamāyaṃ, dutiyāyañca.
anya-e0805n:1541_0: Sayaṃ sāmaṃ saṃ sammā kinti iccete tatiyatthe,
anya-e0805n:1541_2: Suttaso padaso aniccato dukkhato ekadhā dvidhā iccādi.
anya-e0805n:1542_0: Tave tuṃpaccayantā catutthiyā, kātave dātave kātuṃ kāretuṃ dātuṃ dāpetuṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n:1543_0: So topaccayantā pañcamiyatthe, dīghaso oraso rājato vā corato vā iccādi.
anya-e0805n:1544_2: Ekato purato pacchato passato piṭṭhito pādato sīsato aggato mūlato yatra yattha yahiṃ tatra tattha tahiṃ tahaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n:1545_0: Samantā sāmantā parito abhito samantato ekajjhaṃ ekamantaṃ heṭṭhā upari uddhaṃ adho tiriyaṃ sammukhā
anya-e0805n:1545_1: parammukhā āvi raho tiro uccaṃ nīcaṃ anto antarā ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā bāhirā bāhiraṃ bahi oraṃ pāraṃ ārā
anya-e0805n:1545_2: ārakā pacchā pure huraṃ pecca iccete sattamiyā.
anya-e0805n:1546_0: Sampati āyati ajja aparajju parajja suve sve parasuve hiyyo pare sajju sāyaṃ pāto kālaṃ kallaṃ divā nattaṃ
anya-e0805n:1546_1: niccaṃ satataṃ abhiṇhaṃ abhikkhaṇaṃ muhuṃ muhuttaṃ bhūtapubbaṃ purā yadā tadā kadā iccādayo kālasattamiyā.
anya-e0805n:1547_0: Avibhattiyuttesu ca appeva appevanāma nu iccete saṃsayatthe.
anya-e0805n:1548_0: Addhā aññadatthu taggha jātu kāmaṃ sasakkaṃiccete ekaṃsatthe.
anya-e0805n:1553_0: Yāva tāva yāvatā tāvatā kittāvatā ettāvatā kīva iccete paricchedanatthe.
anya-e0805n:1554_0: Evaṃ sāhu lahu opāyikaṃ patirūpaṃ āma sādhu iti sampaṭicchanatthe.
anya-e0805n:1555_0: Yathā tathā yatheva tatheva evaṃ evameva evamevaṃ evampi yathāpi seyyathāpi seyyathāpināma viya iva yathariva
anya-e0805n:1555_1: tathariva yathānāma tathānāma yathāhi tathāhi yathācatathāca iccete paṭibhāgatthe.
anya-e0805n:1560_0: Nāmaiti garaha pasaṃsana saññā pañhesu ca.
anya-e0805n:1567_0: Yasmā tasmā tathāhi tena iccete kāraṇacchedanatthe.
anya-e0805n:1578_0: Khippaṃ araṃ lahu āsuṃ tuṇṇaṃ aciraṃ sīghatthe.
anya-e0805n:1588_1: passituna passiya passitvāna passitvā disvā disvānadassetvā dātuna datvāna datvā upādāya dāpetvā viññāpetvā
anya-e0805n:1588_2: viceyya vineyya nihacca samecca apecca upecca ārabbha āgamma iccādi.
anya-e0805n:1589_0: Evaṃ nāmākhyātopasaggavinimuttaṃ yadabyayalakkhaṇaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ nipātapadanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n:1592_0: Nepātikanti taṃ vuttaṃ, yaṃ abyaya salakkhaṇa”nti.
anya-e0805n:1603_3: purisotiādīnañhi pakatippaccayādivibhāgakappanāya nipphāditānaṃ saddappatirūpakānaṃ nāmikapadānaṃ paṭhamaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ pakatirūpaṃ apākaṭattā,
anya-e0805n:1603_7: liṅganato vā liṅganti anvatthanāmavasena vā “dhātuppaccayavibhattivajjitamatthavaṃ liṅga”nti vacanato
anya-e0805n:1603_8: parasamaññāvasena vā liṅganti idha pāṭipadikāparanāmadheyyaṃ syādivibhatyantapadapakatirūpameva vuccatīti
anya-e0805n:1604_0: Liṅgassattho nāma pabandhavisesākārena pavattamāne rūpādayo upādāya paññāpīyamāno tadaññānaññabhāvena
anya-e0805n:1604_1: anibbacanīyo samūhasantānādibhedo upādāpaññattisaṅkhāto ghaṭapaṭādivohārattho ca pathavīdhātuphassādīnaṃ
anya-e0805n:1605_2: Tattha kammādīsu dutiyādīnaṃ vidhīyamānattā kammādisaṃsaggarahito liṅgasaṅkhyāparimāṇayutto,
anya-e0805n:1605_3: tabbinimuttupasaggādipadatthabhūto ca suddho saddattho idha liṅgattho nāma.
anya-e0805n:1606_0: Yo pana ākhyātakitakataddhitasamāsehi vutto kammādisaṃsaṭṭho attho,
anya-e0805n:1606_1: sopi dutiyādīnaṃ puna attanā vattabbassa atthavisesassābhāvena avisayattā,
anya-e0805n:1610_0: Saliṅge tāva – eso puriso, ete purisā, esā kaññā, etā kaññāyo, etaṃ cittaṃ, etāni cittāni.
anya-e0805n:1613_0: Liṅgādivinimutte sattāmatte – ca vā ha ahaṃ atthi sakkālabbhā iccādi.
anya-e0805n:1614_0: “Liṅgatthe paṭhamā”ti adhikicca “ālapane cā”ti ālapanatthe ca paṭhamā,
anya-e0805n:1615_0: Ettha ca āmantanaṃ nāma pageva laddhasarūpassa saddena abhimukhīkaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0805n:1615_2: tasmā āmantanasamaye kriyāyogābhāvato idaṃ kārakavohāraṃ na labhati.
anya-e0805n:1619_0: Bho purisa ehi, bho purisā vā, bhavanto purisā etha.
anya-e0805n:1623_0: Anabhihite evāyaṃ, “kammani dutiyāyaṃ tto”ti vacanañcettha ñāpakaṃ.
anya-e0805n:1625_0: “Yena vā kayirate taṃ karaṇa”nti ito “vā”ti vattate.
anya-e0805n:1627_0: Yaṃ vā karoti, yaṃ vā vikaroti, yaṃ vā pāpuṇāti, taṃ kārakaṃ kammasaññaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n:1628_4: taṃ pana kārakaṃ chabbidhaṃ kammaṃ kattā karaṇaṃ sampadānamapādānamokāso cāti.
anya-e0805n:1628_6: parikappato vā kammādimhi satiyeva kriyābhāvato kammādīnaṃ channampi kārakavohāro siddhova hoti.
anya-e0805n:1629_0: Taṃ pana kammaṃ tividhaṃ nibbattanīyaṃ vikaraṇīyaṃ pāpaṇīyañcāti. Yathā –
anya-e0805n:1633_0: Ettha ca icchitānicchitakathitākathitādibhedamanapekkhitvā sabbasaṅgāhakavasena “yaṃ karoti taṃ kamma”nti vuttattā,
anya-e0805n:1633_1: atthantaravikappanavādhikārato ca sabbattha imināva kammasaññā hoti.
anya-e0805n:1635_2: Ettha hi “kambala”miti kathitakammaṃ dvikammikāya yācanakriyāya pattumicchitatarattā.
anya-e0805n:1638_0: 286. Gati buddhi bhuja paṭha hara kara sayādīnaṃ kārite vā.
anya-e0805n:1639_7: si saye iccevamādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ payoge kārite sati payojjakakattubhūte kammani liṅgamhā dutiyāvibhatti hoti vā.
anya-e0805n:1642_0: Abhihite na bhavati, purisena puriso gāmaṃ gamīyate, sisso dhammaṃ bodhīyate iccādi.
anya-e0805n:1644_1: Kāladdhānaṃ dabbaguṇakriyāhi accantasaṃyoge tehi kāladdhānavācīhi liṅgehi dutiyāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n:1646_0: Addhāne – yojanaṃ vanarāji, yojanaṃ dīgho pabbato, kosaṃ sajjhāyati.
anya-e0805n:1647_0: Accantasaṃyogeti kiṃ? Māse māse bhuñjati, yojane yojane vihāraṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0805n:1649_0: Kammappavacanīyehi nipātopasaggehi yutte yoge sati liṅgamhā dutiyāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n:1650_0: Kammaṃ pavacanīyaṃ yesaṃ te kammappavacanīyā, parasamaññāvasena vā anvādayo kammappavacanīyā.
anya-e0805n:1652_0: Lakkhaṇādīsu “lakkhaṇi’tthambhūtakkhānabhāga vicchāsu pati pari anavo”ti pati pari anūnaṃ kammappavacanīyasaññā vuttā.
anya-e0805n:1653_0: Lakkhaṇe sūriyuggamanaṃ pati dibbā bhakkhā pātubhaveyyuṃ,
anya-e0805n:1654_0: Itthambhūtakkhāne sādhu devadatto mātaraṃ pati, mātaraṃ pari, mātaraṃ anu.
anya-e0805n:1655_0: Bhāge yadettha maṃ pati siyā, maṃ pari, maṃ anu, taṃ dīyatu.
anya-e0805n:1657_1: Taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato,
anya-e0805n:1660_2: Antarā ca rājagahaṃ antarā ca nāḷandaṃ addhānamaggappaṭipanno,
anya-e0805n:1660_3: rājagahassa ca nāḷandāya ca majjheti attho.
anya-e0805n:1663_0: Tatiyāsattamīnamatthe ca kvaci liṅgamhā dutiyāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n:1665_0: Sattamiyatthe – kāle, upānvajjhāvasassa payoge, adhisiṭṭhāvasānaṃ payoge, tappānacāre ca dutiyā.
anya-e0805n:1666_0: Kāle tāva – pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā, ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā. Imaṃ rattiṃ cattāro mahārājāno.
anya-e0805n:1668_0: Tappānacāresu – nadiṃ pivati, gāmaṃ carati iccādi.
anya-e0805n:1674_0: Yena vā kattā upakaraṇabhūtena vatthunā kriyaṃ abyavadhānena karoti,
anya-e0805n:1675_1: ettha ca satipi sabbakārakānaṃ kriyāsādhakatte “yena vā kayirate”ti visesetvā vacanaṃ kattūpakaraṇabhūtesu kārakesu sādhakatamasseva gahaṇatthaṃ.
anya-e0805n:1678_0: Sambhāvīyati taṃ vuttaṃ, karaṇaṃ nāma kāraka”nti.
anya-e0805n:1683_0: Kattari ca kārake liṅgamhā tatiyāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n:1686_0: Yo kriyaṃ attappadhāno hutvā karoti, so kattusañño hoti.
anya-e0805n:1687_3: Yo aññaṃ kātuṃ samatthaṃ akarontaṃ kammaṃ niyojeti,
anya-e0805n:1688_0: Yaṃ pana tattha tattha gacchati devadatto,
anya-e0805n:1688_4: kiṃ tattha payojakabyāpārena akarontaṃ balena kārayati,
anya-e0805n:1692_0: Yo kattāraṃ kāreti, so hetusañño hoti, kattā cāti hetukattusaññā.
anya-e0805n:1693_0: Yo pana parassa kriyaṃ paṭicca kammabhūtopi sukarattā sayameva sijjhanto viya hoti,
anya-e0805n:1696_0: Appayutto payutto vā, sa kattāti pavuccati.
anya-e0805n:1701_0: Nanu ca “saṃyogo jāyate”tiādīsu kathaṃ pure asato jananakriyāya kattubhāvosiyāti? Vuccate –
anya-e0805n:1701_2: avijjamānampi hi loko saddābhidheyyatāya vijjamānaṃ viya gahetvā voharati,
anya-e0805n:1701_5: aññathā sutamayañāṇenapi paccakkhena viya vatthusabhāvasacchikaraṇappasaṅgo ca musāvāda kudiṭṭhivādādīnamabhāvappasaṅgo ca siyā,
anya-e0805n:1701_6: tasmā buddhiparikappitapaññattivasenapi saddappavatti hotīti asato saṃyogādissapi hoteva jananakriyāya kattukārakatāti.
anya-e0805n:1705_0: Buddhiyā gahitattā hi, saṃyogo jāyate iti;
anya-e0805n:1708_0: Abhihite na bhavati. Kaṭaṃ karoti devadatto, kāreti vā.
anya-e0805n:1709_1: sā bhinnena sīsena paggharantena lohitena paṭivissakānaṃ ujjhāpesi,
anya-e0805n:1709_2: ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṃ navaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeyya,
anya-e0805n:1717_0: Saha saddhiṃ samaṃ nānā vinā alaṃ kimiccevamādīhi yoge liṅgamhā tatiyāvibhatti hoti,
anya-e0805n:1718_0: Tattha sahasaddena yogo kriyā guṇa dabba samavāye sambhavati. Yathā –
anya-e0805n:1718_6: sabbehi me piyehi manāpehi nānābhāvo vinābhāvo,
anya-e0805n:1719_0: Sahatthe – devadatto rājagahaṃ pāvisi kokālikena pacchāsamaṇena, dukkho bālehi saṃvāso.
anya-e0805n:1721_0: Yogaggahaṇamihānuvattate, hetvatthe, hetvatthappayoge ca liṅgamhā tatiyāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n:1728_0: Kena pāṇi kāmadado, kena pāṇi madhussavo;
anya-e0805n:1729_0: Kena te brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhati.
anya-e0805n:1730_0: Hetvatthappayoge – kena nimittena, kena payojanena, kenaṭṭhena, kena hetunā vasati.
anya-e0805n:1735_0: Yena byādhimatā aṅgena aṅgino vikāro lakkhīyate,
anya-e0805n:1735_2: Ettha ca aṅgamassa atthīti aṅgaṃ, sarīraṃ.
anya-e0805n:1738_0: Sāriputtoti nāmena, vissuto paññavā ca so;
anya-e0805n:1748_0: 302. Yassa dātukāmo rocate dhārayate vā taṃ sampadānaṃ.
anya-e0805n:1753_0: Sampadānaṃ tidhā vuttaṃ, rukkha yācaka bhikkhavo”ti.
anya-e0805n:1757_1: Silāgha hanu ṭhā sapa dhāra piha kudha duhi ssāsūya rādhikkha paccāsuṇa anupatigiṇapubbakattārocanatthatadattha
anya-e0805n:1757_2: tumatthālamattha maññānādarappāṇini gatyatthakammani āsisattha sammuti bhiyyasattamyatthesu ca.
anya-e0805n:1758_10: usūya dosāvikaraṇe iccetesaṃ tadatthavācīnañca dhātūnaṃ payoge ca rādha hiṃsāsaṃrādhesu,
anya-e0805n:1758_11: ikkha dassanaṅkesūti imesaṃ payoge ca pati āpubbassa su savaṇeti imassa ca anupatipubbassa gesaddeti imassa ca pubbakattā ca ārocanatthappayoge, tadatthe, tumatthe,
anya-e0805n:1758_12: alamatthappayoge ca maññatippayoge anādare appāṇini ca gatyatthānaṃ kammani ca āsisatthappayoge ca sammuti
anya-e0805n:1758_13: bhiyyappayogesu ca sattamyatthe cāti taṃ kammādikārakaṃ sampadānasaññaṃ hoti,
anya-e0805n:1758_14: casaddaggahaṇena pahiṇatikappati pahoti upamāñjalikaraṇa phāsu atthaseyyappabhutiyoge ca pure viya catutthī.
anya-e0805n:1759_0: Silāghādippayoge tāva – buddhassa silāghate. Upajjhāyassa silāghate, thometīti attho.
anya-e0805n:1760_0: Hanute mayhameva, hanute tuyhameva, apalapatīti attho.
anya-e0805n:1761_2: Bhikkhussa bhuñjamānassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭheyya.
anya-e0805n:1762_0: Tuyhaṃ sapate, mayhaṃ sapate, ettha ca sapanaṃ nāma saccakaraṇaṃ.
anya-e0805n:1765_0: Kodhādiatthānaṃ payoge yaṃ pati kopo, tassa kujjha mahāvīra, yadihaṃ tassa kuppeyyaṃ.
anya-e0805n:1766_0: Duhayati disānaṃ megho, yo mittānaṃ na dubbhati.
anya-e0805n:1768_0: Dujjanā guṇavantānaṃ usūyanti, kā usūyā vijānataṃ.
anya-e0805n:1770_0: Āyasmato upālittherassa upasampadāpekkho upatisso, āyasmantaṃ vā.
anya-e0805n:1771_0: Paccāsuṇa anupatigiṇānaṃ pubbakattā ca suṇotissa dhātussa paccāyoge,
anya-e0805n:1771_1: giṇassa ca anupatiyoge pubbassa kammuno yo kattā,
anya-e0805n:1772_0: Yo vadeti sa kattāti, vuttaṃ kammanti vuccati;
anya-e0805n:1774_6: Ettha ca ārocanasaddassa kathanappakāratthattā desanatthādippayogepi catutthī.
anya-e0805n:1778_0: Akārantato liṅgamhā parassa catutthekavacanassa āyādeso hoti vā, saralopādi.
anya-e0805n:1779_1: piṇḍapātaṃ paṭisevāmi neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya,
anya-e0805n:1780_0: Tumatthe – lokānukampāya, lokamanukampitunti attho. Tathā phāsuvihārāya.
anya-e0805n:1784_0: Anādareti kiṃ? Suvaṇṇaṃ taṃ maññe. Appāṇinīti kiṃ? Gadrabhaṃ tuvaṃ maññe.
anya-e0805n:1787_0: Sammutippayoge – sādhu sammuti me tassa bhagavato dassanāya.
anya-e0805n:1789_0: Sattamiyatthe āvikaraṇa pātubhavanādiyoge – tuyhañcassa āvikaromi, tassa me sakko pāturahosi.
anya-e0805n:1793_1: sotthisvāgatādīhi ca yoge liṅgamhā catutthīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n:1802_0: Taṃ pana tividhaṃ visayabhedena niddiṭṭhavisayaṃ, upāttavisayaṃ, anumeyyavisayañcāti.
anya-e0805n:1804_2: tathāpi cittasaṃyogapubbakassa apagamanassa sambhavato iminā ca apādānasaññā.
anya-e0805n:1805_0: Yattha pana apagamanakriyaṃ upāttaṃ ajjhāhaṭaṃ visayaṃ katvā pavattati,
anya-e0805n:1806_2: Ettha hi kenaci guṇena ukkaṃsīyantīti anumeyyova kriyāviseso.
anya-e0805n:1811_0: Calaṃ yathā – dhāvatā hatthimhā patito aṅkusadhārī.
anya-e0805n:1816_2: upasaggayoge ca ādisaddena nipātayoge ca taṃyuttaṃ kārakaṃ apādānasaññaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n:1819_1: mariyādābhividhiatthe āyoge patinā patinidhipatidānatthena yoge ca. Yathā –
anya-e0805n:1819_12: buddhasmā pati sāriputto dhammadesanāya ālapati temāsaṃ.
anya-e0805n:1820_3: Vinā saddhammā natthañño koci nātho loke vijjati.
anya-e0805n:1821_2: ito pakkhasmā migaṃ vijjhatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n:1825_3: rājato vā corato vā aggito vā udakato vā nānābhayato vā nānārogato vā nānāupaddavato vā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhantu.
anya-e0805n:1829_0: Vāti kiṃ? Jetavane antarahito. Yenāti kiṃ? Yakkho tattheva antaradhāyati.
anya-e0805n:1832_0: Ettha ca dūrantikañca dūrantikatthañcāti dūrantikanti sarūpekasesaṃ katvā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0805n:1834_0: Antikatthappayoge – antikaṃ gāmā, āsannaṃ gāmā, samīpaṃ gāmā, gāmassa samīpanti attho.
anya-e0805n:1837_1: ito ekanavutikappamatthake vipassī bhagavā loke udapādi,
anya-e0805n:1840_0: Vibhattaṃ nāma sayaṃ vibhattasseva tadaññato guṇena vibhajanaṃ,
anya-e0805n:1840_2: yato paṇītataro vā visiṭṭhataro vā natthi,
anya-e0805n:1842_2: mātito ca pitito ca suddho anupakkuṭṭho agarahito.
anya-e0805n:1844_2: kasmā nu tumhaṃ daharā na mīyare,
anya-e0805n:1847_2: gambhīrato ca puthulato ca yojanaṃ candabhāgāya parimāṇaṃ,
anya-e0805n:1848_0: Dīghaso nava vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā pamāṇikā kāretabbā.
anya-e0805n:1849_0: Ettha ca “smāhismiṃna”miccādito “smā”ti ca “so, vā”ti ca vattamāne
anya-e0805n:1851_0: Dīgha oraicceteti smāvacanassa soādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0805n:1853_1: ettha ca pubbaggahaṇaṃ adisatthavuttino pubbādiggahaṇassupalakkhaṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0805n:1856_0: Pañhakathanesu – kutosi tvaṃ, kuto bhavaṃ, pāṭaliputtato. Ettha ca kathanaṃ nāma vissajjanaṃ.
anya-e0805n:1858_1: kammassa katattā upacitattā ussannattā vipulattā uppannaṃ hoti cakkhuviññāṇa,
anya-e0805n:1858_2: na tāvidaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ahetukaṃ sabbattha sabbadā sabbesañca ekasadisabhāvāpattito.
anya-e0805n:1863_5: ananubodhā appaṭivedhā catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ adassanā evamidaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ,
anya-e0805n:1868_2: taṃ pati so attho sāmisañño hoti.
anya-e0805n:1869_0: Ettha ca kriyābhisambandhābhāvā na kārakatā sambhavati.
anya-e0805n:1869_2: tathā hi “rañño puriso”ti vutte yasmā rājā dadāti,
anya-e0805n:1869_5: Evaṃ yo yassa āyatto sevakādibhāvena vā bhaṇḍabhāvena vā samīpa samūhāvayavavikāra kāriyaavatthā jāti guṇa kriyādivasena vā,
anya-e0805n:1869_6: tassa sabbassāpi so sambandhādhārabhūto visesanaṭṭhānī āgamīvasena tividhopi attho sāmī nāmāti gahetabbo.
anya-e0805n:1879_2: ettha ca rājā purisaṃ aññasāmito viseseti nivattetīti visesanaṃ,
anya-e0805n:1880_0: Bhaṇḍena sambandhe – pahūtaṃ me dhanaṃ sakka, etassa paṭivīso, bhikkhussa pattacīvaraṃ.
anya-e0805n:1883_0: Avayavasambandhe – manussasseva te sīsaṃ, rukkhassa sākhā.
anya-e0805n:1885_0: Kāriyasambandhe – yavassa aṅkuro, meghassa saddo, puttāpi tassa bahavo, kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko.
anya-e0805n:1886_0: Avatthāsambandhe – khandhānaṃ pātubhāvo, khandhānaṃ jarā, khandhānaṃ bhedo.
anya-e0805n:1897_0: Yajassa karaṇe – pupphassa buddhaṃ yajati, pupphena vā, ghatassa aggiṃ juhoti.
anya-e0805n:1898_3: Imameva kāyaṃ pūraṃ nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhati,
anya-e0805n:1901_5: santi hi bhante uḷārā yakkhā bhagavato pasannā,
anya-e0805n:1908_2: kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmi,
anya-e0805n:1917_2: Ettha hi devadattataṇḍulānaṃ kattukammānaṃ dhāraṇato taṃsamavetaṃ āsanapacanasaṅkhātaṃ kriyaṃ dhāreti nāma.
anya-e0805n:1918_0: So panāyamokāso catubbidho byāpiko opasilesiko sāmīpiko vesayikoti.
anya-e0805n:1919_0: Tattha byāpiko nāma yattha sakalopi ādhārabhūto attho ādheyyena patthaṭo hoti,
anya-e0805n:1920_0: Opasilesiko nāma paccekasiddhānaṃ bhāvānaṃ yattha upasilesena upagamo hoti,
anya-e0805n:1921_0: Sāmīpiko nāma yattha samīpe samīpivohāraṃ katvā tadāyattavuttitādīpanatthaṃ ādhārabhāvo vikappīyati,
anya-e0805n:1923_0: Sabbopi cāyamādhāro padhānavasena vā parikappitavasena vā kriyāya patiṭṭhā bhavatīti okāsotveva vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0805n:1935_0: Sāmī issara adhipati dāyāda sakkhipatibhū pasūta kusalaiccetehi yoge chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti,
anya-e0805n:1938_1: jāti guṇa kriyā nāmehi samudāyato ekadesassa puthakkaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0805n:1938_2: tasmiṃ niddhāraṇatthe gamyamāne tato samudāyavāciliṅgamhā chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti,
anya-e0805n:1941_0: Anādare gamyamāne bhāvavatā liṅgamhā chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti,
anya-e0805n:1948_0: Kammatthe – bhikkhūsu abhivādenti, muddhani cumbitvā, purisassa bāhāsu gahetvā.
anya-e0805n:1953_3: saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi.
anya-e0805n:1954_0: Yā palālamayaṃ mālaṃ, nārī datvāna cetiye;
anya-e0805n:1957_0: Pañcamyatthe ca liṅgamhā sattamīvibhatti hoti. Kadalīsu gaje rakkhanti.
anya-e0805n:1959_0: Kālo nāma nimesa khaṇa laya muhutta pubbaṇhādiko,
anya-e0805n:1959_3: tasmiṃ kālatthe ca bhāvalakkhaṇe bhāvatthe ca liṅgamhā sattamīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n:1961_5: jāyamāne kho sāriputta bodhisatte ayaṃ dasasahassilokadhātu saṃkampi sampakampi sampavedhi.
anya-e0805n:1966_2: issaratthe ca vattamānehi upaadhiiccetehi yoge adhikissaravacane gamyamāne liṅgamhā sattamīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n:1967_5: sammutiupapattivisuddhidevasaṅkhātehi tividhehipi devehi sabbaññū buddhova adhikoti attho.
anya-e0805n:1968_0: Issaravacane – adhi brahmadatte pañcālā, brahmadattissarā pañcālāti attho.
anya-e0805n:1972_0: Pabhedā sattadhā kammaṃ, kattā pañcavidho bhave.
anya-e0805n:1973_0: Karaṇaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti, sampadānaṃ tidhā mataṃ;
anya-e0805n:1975_0: Vibhattiyo pana paccattavacanādivasena aṭṭhavidhā bhavanti. Yathāha
anya-e0805n:1982_0: So ca saññāvasena chabbidho abyayībhāvo kammadhārayo digu tappuriso bahubbīhi dvando cāti.
anya-e0805n:1989_1: nipātapubbako ca nāmiko yuttattho teheva attapubbakehi upasagganipātehi saha niccaṃ samasīyate,
anya-e0805n:1989_3: Idha abyayībhāvādisaññāvidhāyakasuttāneva vā saññāvidhānamukhena samāsavidhāyakānīti daṭṭhabbāni.
anya-e0805n:1992_0: Tesaṃ nāmānaṃ payujjamānapadatthānaṃ yo yuttattho, so samāsasañño hoti, tadaññaṃ vākyamiti ruḷhaṃ.
anya-e0805n:1993_0: Nāmāni syādivibhatyantāni, samassateti samāso, saṅkhipiyatīti attho.
anya-e0805n:1998_2: sambandho vā attho yassa soyaṃ yuttattho,
anya-e0805n:1998_3: etena saṅgatatthena yuttatthavacanena bhinnatthānaṃ ekatthībhāvo samāsalakkhaṇanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n:1998_4: Ettha ca “nāmāna”nti vacanena “devadatto pacatī”tiādīsu ākhyātena samāso na hotīti dasseti.
